chos rtogs/ chos kyi gting slebs/ som nyis las brgal/ the tshom las brgal te/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan gyi dkri ba med la ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs
te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni 'phags lags so/ /btsun pa

bdag ni sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o/ /bdag deng blan can ci srid 'tsho ba'i bar du khong nas dad pa'i dge bsnyen lags par gzung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab du gshegasu
gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /ci srid 'tsho'i bar du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /

gzim cha dang / stan dang / snyun gsol dang / sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po

gzugs can snying po dang / lha brgyad khri dang yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag stong phrag du ma skyabasu 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams dang / g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang / bde ba'i mya ngan
las 'das pa la bkod pa dang / gzhi de las bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pas 'jig rten kun tu rgyas par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das

pa'i dus na yang rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang / lha brgyad khri dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag stong phrag du ma mang po 'di rnams bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /

dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ngas ji ltar bkod pa dang / gzhi des na nga'i grags pas 'jig rten du rgyas par gyur pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer rdul ldan zhes bya ba na/ rgyal

po phyogs kyi bdag po zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang /

chom rkun dang / nad dang / mu ge med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug te/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid

byed do/ /de nas rgyal po de btsun mo dang / lhan gcig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las btsun mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon pa dang / bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa

zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/ ming rdul zhes bya bar btagaso/ /de nas khye'u rdul pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /

rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis/ 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying ku dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo chog gis bskyed bsrings te/

'tsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ khye'u de yi ge slob du bcug te/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi

gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che bzhon pa dang / rta bzhon pa dang / mtshon chas bcang ba dang / 'phong dang / mdun du bsnur ba dang / phyir bsnur ba dang / g.yul las thar bar bya ba dang / lcags kyus bzung ba

dang / zhags pas bzung ba dang / mda' bo che 'phang ba dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang / 'khor lo 'phang ba dang / gcad pa dang / gsheg pa dang / lag pas bzung ba

dang / rkang pa'i stabs dang / mgo bo skyab pa dang / rgyang mar 'phang ba dang / sgra grags par 'phang ba dang / gnad bu 'phog pa dang / gdon mi za bar phog pa dang / tshabs che bar btang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la

byang bar gyur to/ /rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po'i mdun na 'don ni bram ze khyim bdag khyab 'jug ces bya ba yin te/ de yang mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa/ rtsis mgo thabs shes pa'i shes rab dang / dpyod

pa dang ldan pa zhig ste/ de rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po'i rgyal po'i 'phrin las su bya ba thams cad byed la/ rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag pos kyang / mdun na 'don bram ze khyab 'jug la rgyal srid gtad nas/ khang

bzang gi steng na 'dug cing bud med 'ba' zhig dang / sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /phyi zhig na bram ze khyab 'jug gi chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon pa dang / bu

gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te/ khye'u'i ming me skyong zhes btags so/ /de nas khye'u me skyong 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying

kus bskyed bsrings te/ de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ bram ze'i spyod lam dang / spyod pa dang / oM zhes bya ba dang / b+ho zhes bya ba dang / gtsang sbra dang / cho ga dang / thal ba blangs ba dang / ril ba thogs pa dang / nges

brjod kyi rig byed dang / mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang / snyan tshig gi rig byed dang / srid srung gi rig byed dang / mchod sbyin bya ba dang / mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang / sbyin pa dang / blang ba dang / kha don byed pa dang /

kha don slob du gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/ las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/ de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas bcwo brgyad la byang bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i phas khye'u me skyong la smras pa/ bu khyod ni yab

'das pa'i 'og tu yab kyi thabs kyi yul sar 'jug par 'gyur la/ khyod ni 'di'i mdun na 'don du 'gyur gyi/ 'di la khyod kyis bskor cig /snga nas bskor ba dang / khyod la 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /me skyong

gis smras pa/ jo bos ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/ gzhon nu rdul gyi phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo / /de nas phyi zhig na bram ze khyab 'jug shi nas/ de shi ba'i phyir rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po shin tu

mya ngan byed cing / sdug bsngal la smre sngags 'don par byed do/ /de nas gzhon nu rdul gyis gsol pa/ lha khyod ci'i slad du bram ze khyab 'jug gum pa'i slad du/ shin tu thugs ngan mdzad cing 'o brgyal la/ smre sngags

'don cing bzhugs/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bram ze khyab 'jug ni nga'i rgyal po'i 'phrin lasu bya ba thams cad byed de/ de'i mthus nga'i snying khral chung ngur 'dug go/ /gzhon nu rdul gyis gsol pa/ lha khyod bram ze

khyab 'jug gum pa'i slad du ha cang thugs ngan ma mdzad/ ha cang 'o brgyal bar ma mdzad ha cang sme sngags 'don par ma mdzad cig dang / mkhan po de nyid kyi bu bram ze'i khye'u me skyong zhes bgyi ba/ pha bas kyang ches

khyad par du 'phags pa zhig mchis pa de/ lhas mdun na 'don du bsko bar gsol/ 'on tang des lha'i rgyal po'i 'phrin las su bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po phyogs

kyi bdag pos/ bram ze'i khye'u me skyong 'gug pa btang nas mdun na 'don du bcug go/ /de nas des kyang rgyal po de'i bya ba thams cad nyamasu blangs so/ /de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag pos/ gzhon

nu rgyal sar bcug nas/ phyogs kyi bdag po shi'o/ /de nas de'i ming gzhon nu rdul zhes bya ba de med par gyur nas/ rgyal po rdul zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po rdul gyis kyang bram ze'i khye'u me skyong

dgug pa btang nas/ de la smras pa/ mkhan po khyod kyis ci ltar nga'i yab kyi rgyal po'i 'phrin las su bya ba thams cad byas pa de bzhin du nga'i yang gyis shig /bram ze'i khye'us gsol pa/ lha de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes

gsol nas/ bram ze'i khye'u me skyong gis rgyal po rdul gyi rgyal srid kyi bya ba thams cad nyams su blangs so/ /de nas de'i ming me skyong zhes bya ba gang yin pa de med par gyur nas/ me skyong khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur to/ /

de'i tshe rgyal po rdul gyi sngon gzhon nu'i tshe/ mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu drug cig yod pa de dag /rgyal po de'i thad du 'ongs nas smras pa/ lhas bdag cag gi yul dbog tu gsol/

de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal pos me skyong khyab 'jug la bka' stsal pa/ mkhan po khyod kyis sa chen po 'di cha bdun du bgos la/ cha drug ni gzhon nu 'di rnams la byin cig /cha gcig ni nga'i bya'o/ /

des gsol pa/ lha de bzhin du 'tshalo zhes byas nas/ me skyong khyab 'jug gis sa chen po 'di cha bdun du bgos te/ cha drug ni gzhon nu drug po rnams la byin no/ /cha gcig ni rgyal po rdul gyi skal bar lus shing 'dug

go/ /de nas rgyal po rdul gyis rgyal rigs drug po de dag rang rang gi rgyal srid la bkod do/ /de nas me skyong khyab 'jug ni 'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs par bkur te/ bram ze khyab 'jug ni tshangs pa'i lam yin no snyam du

'dzin cing / tshangs pa'i lam yin par blta'o/ /de nas phyi zhig na/ bram ze khyab 'jug 'di snyam du sems bdag ni rgyal khams thams cad kyi mi rnams kyis tshangs par bkur te/ bram ze khyab 'jug ni tshangs

pa'i lam yin no snyam du 'dzin cing / tshangs pa'i lam yin par lta la/ gna'i bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/ sde tshan gyi slob dpon chen po dag la bdag gis thos na/ bram ze gang gis dbyar zla ba bzhi'i bar

du byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas pa de la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bltar 'ong ngo zhes zer gyi ma la bdag gis thams cad spangs te/ khang bzangs kyi steng du song la/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang /

dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pas gnas par bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag ni dbyar zla ba bzhi pa'i gnas kyi gnas par 'tshal te/ de bas na lhas

lha nyid kyis rgyal po'i 'phrin las su bgyi ba gang lags pa thams cad bgyid pa'i mdun na 'don gzhan zhig bsgo bar gsol zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa/ khyod ci ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o/ /

de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos las su bya ba thams cad spangs nas/ khang bzangs kyi steng du song te/ khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug cing / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang

ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas so/ /de nas phyi zhig na de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bltar 'ongs nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i kha dog gi mthus/ khang bzangs de dag thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur

to/ /de nas de mthong nas/ /tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ bdag gis kha dog 'di 'dra ba/ /sngon cad ma thos ma mthong te/ /kha dog bzang zhing gzugs bzang ba/ /grogs po khyod ni su zhig lags/ /mi mjed kyi bdag

po tshangs pas smras pa/ gzhon nu brgya byin la sogs dang / /de bzhin lus can gzhan dag kyang / /bdag ni tshangs pa'i lus su shes/ /khyab 'jug de ltar shes par gyis/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug
gis smras pa/ tshangs pa khyod la 'dud par bgyi/ /tshangs pa khyod la mchod par 'tshal/ bdag gi tshig ni gsan nas kyang / /lus ni myur du bka' stsol cig /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas

smras pa/ khyab 'jug khyod kyis smras pa'i/ /tshig ni bdag gis gzung bar bya/ /'dri ba yid la ci 'dod pa/ /bram zes nga la dri bar gyis/ /tshe 'di'i ni don yang rung / /phyi ma'i tshe'i don yang rung / /khyod kyis

dris pa de dang de/ /ngas ni nges par bcad par bya/ /bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/ bdag gi the tsom gzhan brtags the tsom rnams/ /bram ze kun bged gzhon nu dri bar gyis/ /gang la gnas shing ci

la bslab bgyis na/ /rdul med mi yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten thob/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras pa/ tshangs pa'i mi'i nga rgyal spangs byas la/ /rtse gcig btud de snying rjes mos byas shing / /dri nga

med cing 'khrig pa rab spangs la/ /de la gnas shing de la bslab byas nas/ /rdul med mi yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten thob/ /bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/ tshangs pa gang dag mi'i dri nga lags/ /chu 'gram chus

g.yog bzhin du gang gis g.yogs/ /ngan song rgyu sde 'jig rten thams cad bsgribs/ /tshangs pa thob pa'i lam yang yongs mi shes/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras pa/ 'khro dang brdzun dang ngan sems 'tshe

ba dang / /ngan du byed dang blo phye phra ma dang / /chags dang sdang dang de bzhin gti mug dang / /'chab pa dang ni ser sna gtum tshig rnams/ /bram ze 'di dag mi'i dri nga ba/ /chu 'gram chus g.yogs bzhin du de yis g.yogs

ngan song rgyud sde 'jig rten thams cad bsgribs/ /tshangs pa thob pa'i lam yang yong mi shes/ /chos 'di rtag tu spyod pa yin/ /de rnams las ni 'das gyur na/ /tshangs pa dag tu skye 'gyur gyis/ /khyod kyi brten par

bsgrim par gyis/ /de skad ces smras nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa mi snang bar gyur nas/ /ring po ma lon par bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos bsam pa/ mi mjed

kyi bdag po tshangs pas ji skad bshad pa'i don bdag gis shes te/ 'di ltar bdag khyim par 'dug te/ khyim na gnas bzhin du ni gcig tu brtul te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs

pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba spyad par dka' na/ ma la bdag gis skra dang kha spu bregs te gos tshon can rnams bgos la/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya gor ma chag snyam

mo/ /de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po rdul/ bram ze khyab 'jug chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze khyab 'jug chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bram ze khyab

'jug chen pos rgyal po rdul la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yul bdag rgyal can rdul gyis ni/ /de ring bdag gi tshig gson gcig /khyod nyid kyis ni rgyal srid srung / /khyab 'jug bdag ni spro ba med/ /rgyal po rdul

gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi 'dod pa ma bskangs pa/ /de ni bdag gis nges par bskang / /khyod kyi gnod pa bdag gis bsal/ /khyab 'jug bdag ni ma dor cig /khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/ bdag ni 'dod pa ma skong med/ /

bdag la gnod pa byed pa 'ang med/ /mi ma yin pa'i tshig thos nas/ /khyim na gnas par spro ba med/ /rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa/ bram ze su'i tshig thos pas/ /nga dang 'dod pa spong byed pa/ /mi ma yin pa ci 'dra ba/ /

dris pa de ni bdag la smros/ /khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/ snying rje la ni gnas nas kyang / /dben pa'i bsam gtan byed pa na/ /de tshe tshangs pa byung nas ni/ /phyogs rnams thams cad snang bar byas/ /bdag gis
de'i tshig thos nas/ /khyim na gnas pa spro ba med/ /rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod nam bdag gi bu tho bo rgyal sar ma bcug gi bar du sdod cig dang / mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su

bdag kyang rab tu byung bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ bram ze gang du 'gro ba der/ /bdag kyang der ni 'gro bar bya/ /bdag gis khyod kyi slob ma byed/ /bdag gi ston pa khyab 'jug khyod/ /khyab 'jug

chen pos smras pa/ so so'i skye bo gar chags pa/ /'dod pa de ni spangs par gyis/ /'dod pa rnams la ma blta bar/ /bden pa'i tshig la gnas par gyis/ /rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa/ tshangs pa dag par skye ba'i phyir/ /

nam mkha' dri med lta bu dang / /nor bu bai dUr+ya dag ltar/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya/ /khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na/ de ltar mdzod cig ces byas nas/ bram

ze khyab 'jug chen pos rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug la smras pa/ kye bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te/ chos gos tshon can bgos la/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nar khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'dod

na/ khyod ji ltar byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod lo bdun gyi bar du sdod cig dang / lo bdun lon nas bdag cag gi bu dang bu mo dag rgyal sar bcug la/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang

rab tu 'byung ngo / /khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/ kye lo bdun ni ha cang yun ring ches so/ /'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba'o/ /longs spyod ni rgyags par 'gyur ba'o/ /'tsho ba dang 'chi ba ni drod
bzung dka'o/ /lo bdun lon nas khyod rab tu byung ngam mi 'byung yang gtol med kyis/ bdag je rab tu byung ngo / /de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod re shig sdod cig dang / lo drug gam/ lnga 'am/
bzhi 'am/ gsum 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gam/ de bzhin du zla bdun nam/ drug gam/ lnga 'am/ bzhi 'am/ gsum 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig gam/ zhag bdun nam/ drug gam/ lnga 'am/ bzhi 'am/ gsum 'am/

gnyis sam/ gcig lon na/ bdag cag gis bu dang nu bo rnams rgyal sar bcug nas/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu byung ngo / /khyab 'jug gis smras pa/ kye zhag bdun yang ha cang yang

yun ring sam/ 'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba 'am/ longs spyod pa rnams ni rgyags par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'tsho ba dang / 'chi ba ni drod gzung dka'o/ /zhag bdun lon nas kyang khyod rab tu 'byung ngam/ mi

'byung gtol med kyis bdag je rab tu 'byung ngo / /de dag gis smras pa/ zhag bdun yang btang te/ deng nyid du bdag cag gi bu dang nu bo dag rgyal sar bcug nas/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang

rab tu 'byung ngo / /khyab 'jug gis smras pa/ khyed kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na/ de ltar gyis shig /de nas bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos/ rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug gi 'khor bltas nas/ bram ze che

zhing mtho ba bdun bltas so/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba bdun bltas nas/ bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu bltas so/ /bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu bltas nas/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bltas so/ /bram ze'i khye'u

lnga brgya bltas nas/ shing rta kha lo ba rnams dang / glang po che'i kha lo ba rnams dang / rta pa rnams dang / shing rta pa rnams dang / mtshon cha pa rnams dang / 'phong ba rnams dang / zhabs ring ba rnams dang / tshal za ba

rnams dang / drag shul can rnams dang / dpa' bo rnams dang / rab gnon pa rnams dang / tshan po che chen po rnams dang / rgyal po'i sras du ma dag bltas te/ kye bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos mtshon can

rnams bgos la yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na khyed ci ltar byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo / /khyab 'jug

gis smras pa/ khyed kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na/ de bzhin du gyis shig ces byas nas/ bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos khyim gyi 'khor thams cad btang te/ sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas te/ du ma dag

dbul por te btang nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos mtshon can rnams bgos nas/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /rab tu byung nas kyang nags khrod cig tu gnas bcas

nas/ yal ga dang lo ma'i spyil po phug ste/ de de na 'dug nas bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed de/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur to/ /khyab 'jug rab tu byung nas rgyal po rdul g.yog

'khor du ma dang / skra dang kha spu bregs te/ chos gos mtshon can rnams bgos nas/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de bzhin du rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug gi 'khor dang / bram

ze che zhing mtho ba bdun dang / bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu dang / bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya dang / shing rta'i kha lo pa rnams dang / glang po che'i kha lo pa rnams dang / rta pa rnams dang / shing rta pa rnams dang / mtshon

cha can rnams dang / zhabs ring ba rnams dang / tshal za ba rnams dang / drag shul can rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / rab gnon pa rnams dang / tshan po che chen po rnams dang / rgyal po'i sras du ma dag skra dang kha

spu bregs te/ gos tshon can rnams bgos nas/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par khyab 'jug rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung te/ bram ze khyab 'jug gis thams cad la yid la byed pa'i

lung phog nas/ de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/ /de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug gi ming bram ze che zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug

ces bya bar gyur pa te med par gyur nas/ ston pa khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe ston pa khyab 'jug ces bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe rgyal po rdul

ces bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di kho na yin no/ /de'i tshe rgyal po rdul gyis mgo drangs pa'i skye bo 'bum phrag du mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mgo

drangs pa'i lha khri dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag stong phrag du ma mang po 'di dag kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang ngas rgyal po rdul la sogs pa yul gyi mi du ma dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag stong phrag du ma

rab tu byung nas/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod de/ gzhi des na nga'i grags pas 'jig rten rgyas par gyur te/ /da ltar yang rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang / lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+ha'i bram
ze dang / khyim bdag stong phrag du ma dam pa'i chos kyis bcud kyis tshim par byas nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang / bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do// //

las brgya tham pa/ bam po sum bcu rtsa bdun pa ste tha ma/ 'thab mo zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na skye bo phal po che 'thab pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed

pa dang / rtsod pa la zhugs shing 'khod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/ rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang / ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
gsum la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/ rnam par thar pa
brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin

dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/ nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni 'phongs shing 'dug /su ni nyams nga bar 'gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni

'phongs pa dang nyams nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngan song nas phyung te/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni nyes par spyod

pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyes pa las bskyed par

bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyis tshon gyis brtol bar bya/ su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten
'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ skye bo phal po che gdul ba'i dus la bab ste/ de dag nges 'thab pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa las bzlog ste/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub
pa dang / bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par bya snyam du dgongs nas/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs te/ skye bo phal

po che ga la ba der gshegs nas/ skye bo phal po che de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang ngo tsha bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan shams nas gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legaso legaso/ /bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs bzhugasu gsol/ de nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che la bka' stsal
pa/ grogs po dag ci byed cing 'khod gzhan dang 'thab dgos na gzhan dang 'thab cing 'dug gam/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag su dang 'thab 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag 'o na 'khod cig dang / ngas khyod la rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos

mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'thab dgos kyis/ nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir 'bad par gyis
shig ces nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na de dag gi khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa med par gyur nas/ stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs
la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs

shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshalo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis
rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ de dag la lung yang phog ste/ de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
sum du byas te/ de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs

pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgong nga'i sbub bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po

dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
skye bo phal po che 'thab pa las zhi bar mdzad pa nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang / bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba'

zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang skye bo phal po che 'di dag bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la ji ltar bkod pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri khrod kyi grong

zhig na bram ze zhig gis mchod sbyin byas te/ mchod sbyin byed pa der bram ze rnams stan gyi phyir 'thab pa las de'i tshe dka' thub kyi gnas shig na/ drang srong 'khor lnga brgya yod pa zhig gnas so/ /de nas mchod sbyin byed pa

der drang srong des bram ze de dag 'thab pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos bstan to/ des na 'thab mo de yang zhi bar gyur la/ bram ze rnams kyang skyo ba skyes nas/ de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ngo / /de dag

der rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /

de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ skye bo phal po che 'di dag kho na yin no/ /de'i tshe yang ngas skye bo phal po che 'thab pa zhi bar byas nas/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod do/ /

da ltar yang ngas skye bo phal po che 'thab pa zhi bar byas nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang / bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/ /gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi
bstan pa la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung nas/ der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to// //

klu zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po zhig gyod cig la btags te/ ci bdogs pa phrogs nas/ khri mon du bcug pa las/ der zas dang skom gyis mnar
te shi'o/ /de nas des smon lam log par btab nas/ shi 'phos te dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa zhig tu skyes nas/ des yul ko sa la de thams cad du mi nad btang te/ skye bo phal

po che de dag kha dag par gyur nas/ ltas mkhan dag gis smras pa/ blon po chen po des 'chi kar smon lam log par btab nas/ gnod sbyin ma rungs par skyes te/ des mi nad 'di dag gtang ngo zhes byas so/ /de nas de

thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po dag ci bya gtol med par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/ 'di ni sus kyang 'dul bar mi nus kyis/ da 'di'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab dgos so
snyam ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis klu ma rungs pa dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang btul/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'brogs gnas la sogs pa gzhan dang

gzhan dag kyang btul na/ btsun pa blon po chen po che ge mo zhig gis smon lam log par btab te/ gnod sbyin ma rungs par skyes nas/ des bdag gi yul du mi nad btang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/
gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
de rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis/ gnod sbyin de rgyal bu rgyal byed

kyi tshal gyi 'dab du bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de btul ba'i phyir me chen po sprul te/ de'i kho ra khor yug nas bdag nyid me chen pos 'khor bar mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung 'ba' zhig

zhi bar mthong ngo / /de nas de 'jigs shing skrag nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sngon mi dge ba'i las byas pas/ rgyal po

gsal rgyal gyi bsad pa yin na/ da yang khyod 'dir skyes nas skye bo mang po kha 'dogs par byed na/ 'di nas shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu khyod kyi 'gro ba ni gang yin/ skye gnas ni gang yin/ 'gro ba'i sa ni gang yin/ gnod
sbyin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ci stsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa'i las 'di thong shig /gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' ci stsal

pa bzhin du 'tshalo/ /de skad ces gsol to/ des skyabasu 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag gis sdig pa'i las btang ste/ btsun pa deng slan cad mnyan du

yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams kyi bsrung ma dang / skyabs rnams ni bdag lagaso/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de
btul nas/ skye bo phal po che de dag 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas gnod sbyin ma rungs

pa 'di btul nas/ skye bo phal po che ji ltar 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa de nyon gcig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA ra na se na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed do/ de'i tshe

yul ka shi ka'i klu gdug pa dug mi bzad pa zhig byung te/ des grong yang stongs par byed/ ljongs kyang stongs par byed cing / bA ra na se'i phyogs su chags pa las rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis thos nas/ de thos ma
thag tu 'jigs pa ches po skyes te/ des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te btang nas/ khyed deng la klu gdug pa de sod gcig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas de dag gis de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/

gsol pa/ lha de ni dpung gi tshogs kyis gum par mi nus kyis/ sngags sam sman gyis 'gum par nus lagaso/ /yang na dge ba'i tshul gyis bkur ba'i dge slong dang / bram ze rnams kyis gdul bar nus lagaso zhes

gsol to/ /de nas de'i tshe bA ra na se de nyid na gdol pa'i khye'u byams pa'i rang bzhin can/ snying rje che ba sems can la byams pa zhig gnas pa des/ skye bo mang po de dag ci bya gtol med par gyur pa mthong nas/ mthong ma

thag tu de snying rje skyes nas des skye bo mang po rnams la smras pa/ khyod ci bya gtol med par bya mi dgos kyis/ bdag gis klu gdug pa de gdul bar bya'o zhes byas so/ /de nas de'i pha ma gnyis na re/ de ni dbugs

gdug pa yin te khyod kyis de gdul mi nus so/ /khye'u des smras pa/ byams pa'i go cha gyon pa la des cung zad kyang gnod par byed mi nus so zhes byas nas/ khye'u des phyogs gang na klu gdug pa 'dug pa'i phyogs der

song nas klu gdug pa des thag ring po zhig nas khye'u de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khros nas khye'u de la dbugs btang ngo / /de nas khye'u des byams pa la snyoms par zhugs nas byams pa'i lta bas klu gdug pa de la

bltas te/ de bltas ma thag tu dug med par gyur to/ /de nas khye'u des klu sbrul de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas mi mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs du bzhag go/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang / skye bo mang po gzhan

dag gis gdol pa'i khye'u che ge mo zhig gis klu gdug pa btul lo zhes thos nas thos ma thag tu rgyal po de rang nyid gdol pa'i khye'u de'i thad du song nas des khye'u de la dam pa sna gcig 'dam du bcug ste khye'u khyod la

dam pa sna cig byin no zhes byas so/ /khye'us smras pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te/ gnas par mdzod cig /yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gzud par mdzod cig

ces byas so/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis khye'u de la longs spyod kyi dbyings chen po byin nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 'dug go/ /yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las

kyi lam la bkod do/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe gdol pa'i khye'ur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe klu gdug par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ gnod sbyin

ma rungs pa 'di kho na yin no/ /de'i tshe skye bo phal po cher gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ yul ko sa la na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po 'di dag kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang ngas klu gdug pa de btul nas/ skye bo phal po che 'jigs

pa med pa'i gnas su bkod do/ /da ltar yang ngas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di btul nas/ skye bo phal po che 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod do/ /gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung
rab la 'di dag thams cad dge bsnyen du gyur te/ der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to// //

shi bi gnyis zhes bya ba de la/ shi bi dang po ni/ bcom ldan 'das gyad kyi yul du ljongasu rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ chu klung mtha' ldan dang / grong khyer kun sha'i bar gyi lam nas kud du bzung ste/ tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi bltab du bgyis te thing shig dang / nga'i rgyab mi bde ba der re shig bsti bar bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
btsun pa de ltar 'tshalo zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du nyan nas/ bla gos bzhi bltab tu byas to/ bting nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa de
bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi bltab tu bgyis te bting lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos bsnam sbyar stug po bltab te 'phangs

su bzhag nas/ snang ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes thugs la dgongs shing glo g.yas phyogs kyi gzim ste/ zhabs gcig gi steng du gcig bzhag go/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'khor 'dir so so'i skye bo'i dge slong ji snyed 'dus shing 'tshogs pa de dag thams cad ci sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba yin nam/ 'on te nyan thos kyis 'dul ba yin

zhig gu snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ 'di na kha cig ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni nyan thos kyis 'dul bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa

kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod byang chub kyi phyogs rnams las spobs par gyis shig /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas 'khor thams cad du sgra des gang bar 'gyur ba

de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas dge slong mang po dag gis tshig de lta bu gsungs pa'i sgra thos nas/ de dag gis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi gtam gyis

shig par bskul bas na da ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sbrang rtsi btsir ba bzhin du chos snyan no chog ston par 'gyur snyams te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor te 'khod do/ /

de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la brten pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la brten pa 'gog pa la brten pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs

su bsgyur ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon par shes pas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan to zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos byang chub kyi yan lag 'di nyid las brtsam nas dge slong rnams

la de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na nyan thos dang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'brel ba gang yin pa de dag gis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par thugasu chud nas bzhengs te/ skyil mo dkrung bcas nas bsku drang por bsrangs te/ dran pa mngon du bzhag nas bzhugs te/ bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod brtson 'grus bstan tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus ston lagaso/ /bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo brtson 'grus ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi phyogs 'di dag nyid la brtsams nas/ de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang brel ba gang yin pa de dag

gis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar
mnyam pa/ namakha' dang lag mthil 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgong nga'i sbub bcom pa/ rig pa mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig

pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su 'gyur to/ /de nas de'i

tshe dge slong zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ snyan pa'i chos ni gsan pa'i phyir/ /ston pa snyun bzhin nyid kyis bskul/ /khyod la byang chub yan lag rnams/ /yod na dge slong khyod shod cig /gnas brtan kun dga'

mkhas shing grags/ /byang bar gyur pas legs shes gsol/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi gsungs rab la/ /dkar ba'i chos rnams de dag mnga'/ /dran dang rnam 'byed brtson 'grus dang / /dga' dang rab sbyangs ting 'dzin dang / /
btang snyoms 'di dag rdul med pa/ /khyod kyi byang chub yan lag lags/ /byang chub yan lag bcud thos nas/ /byang chub yan lag bcud kyang rtogs/ /bcom ldan snyung tshabs che ba las/ /gnod pa de las zhi

bar gyur/ /dam chos rin chen 'di ston pa'i/ /chos kyi mnga' bdag de nyid kyang / /dam chos gsan par bzhed gyur na/ /gzhan lta de lta de mi nyan/ /stobs bcu mnga' bas nye rgyal ni/ /dge slong rnams kyi shes rab

mchog /bstan pa gang yin de nyid kyang / /chos mnyan 'dod pas gzeng bar 'gyur/ /mdo sde 'dul ba ma mo 'dzin/ /mkhas shing tshul dang tshul min shes/ /de dag dam chos nyan byed na/ /gzhan lta ji ltar de mi nyan/ /
mkhas pa shes 'dod sems bzhag nas/ /chos bzhin nyan par byed pa ni/ /sangs rgyas gsung rab skyon med la/ /de bzhin dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /yid dga' lus kyang shin tu sbyangs/ /bde ba yang ni myong
bar 'gyur/ /bde bar gyur nas sems nyid kyis/ /ting 'dzin la yang reg par 'gyur/ /sems ni mnyam par gzhag pa yin/ /'du byed yul gyi rnam par rig /srid pa'i 'gro las skyong bar 'gyur/ /chags

med sems kyis grol bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu srid 'gro skyo gyur na/ /lha dang mi la chags pa med/ /bud shing med pa'i me bzhin du/ /dgra bcom rnams ni mya ngan 'da'/ /dam chos mnyan pa'i phan yon ni/ /mang po gzhan

yang rgyal bas bstan/ /de phyir 'di ni yod snyam du/ /ston pa'i bka' ni mnyan par bya/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni legs par smras pa gsung

ba dang / legs par smra bar bzhed pa lags te/ legs par smra ba'i don gyi slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bskul ba mdzad nas/ bkur sti dang ldan pas gsan kyang gsan/ bshad kyang
bshad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar 'ba' shig legs par smras pa gsungs ba dang / legs par smras pa bzhed pa ma yin gyis/ de bzhin

gshegs pa ni 'das pa'i dus na yang legs par smra ba gsung ba dang / legs par smras pa bzhed pa yin te/ legs par smras pa'i don gyi phyir/ ngas mchog tu dka' ba ji ltar spyad pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon

byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang bzhi ldan zhes bya ba na/ rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang /

'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang nad dang / mu ge med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu

gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/ /rgyal po de yang byams pa'i rang bzhin can/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ sems can la byams pa sbyin pa la sred pa zhig te/ de sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams

dag byed pa la zhugs te/ zas 'dod pa la ni zas sbyin par byed/ skom 'dod pa la ni skom sbyin par byed/ gos 'dod pa la ni gos sbyin par byed/ rgyan 'dod pa la ni rgyan sbyin par byed/ mal stan 'dod pa la ni

mal stan sbyin par byed/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa sbyin par byed/ yo byad gzhan 'dod pa la ni yo byad sbyin par byed/ /nad gso ba'i nad brang bcas te/ yo byad thams cad sbyar nas/ sman pa rnams dang / nad g.yog

rnams bskos te/ nad pa rnams dang / mgon med pa rnams kyi rim gro byed do/ /bza' ba dang / bca' ba mang po dag kyang sta 'on byas te/ namakha' la gnas pa dang chu la gnas pa dang / thang la gnas pa'i srog chags

rnams la sbyin par byed do/ /des yi dam 'di lta bu yang bcas te/ deng phyin cad bdag gis thams cad la thams cad sbyin par bya ste/ 'jig rten dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la dgod par bya'o zhes dam bcas nas

des 'jig rten thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do der dge ba bcu'i las kyis lam yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir sems can phal cher shi ba'i 'og tu lha'i nang du skyes nas/ de dag gis lha'i gnas

rnams gang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ 'di ci zhig sgrub brgya byin du 'gyur ba sgrub 'am/ 'on te tshangs par 'gyur ba sgrub zhig go snyam mo/ /de nas de bltas na/ bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub cing 'dug go/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ ci 'di sems can brtan po yin nam/ 'on te sems can mi brtan pa yin pa bdag gis je brtag la/ gal te sems

can brtan po yin na ni mchod par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ sems can brtan po ma yin yang / 'di'i sems stobs bskyed par bya'o snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bdag nyid srin po'i gzugs su mngon par

sprul nas/ rgyal po shi bi'i khang bzang gi char khebs la 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir smras pa/ kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/ /zhes smras nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i

cha lugs can cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ /de nas rgyal po shi bis lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can gyis tshig de lta bu brjod pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang des bsam pa/ cig tu na mya ngan las 'das pa'i rten cing

'brel par 'byung ba'i sgo phye'o/ /gcig tu na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam bstan to snyamo/ /de nas rgyal po shi bis lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can/ khang bzangs kyi char khebs la 'dug

pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang skyem par langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ smras pa grogs po

tshigasu bcad pa de tshang bar smros shig dang / bdag gis slob ma bgyis te mnyan to/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi bdag gi slob ma byas pas ci la phan/ bdag ni bkres shing skom pas gzir te/ ci za gtol med par

bla zhing 'dug go/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po tshigasu bcad pa tshang bar smros shig dang / bdag gis khyod kha zas kyis tshim par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can gyis smras pa/

grogs po khyod kyis nga kha zas kyis tshim par nus sam smras pa nga'i kha zas dang skom ji lta bu yin pa de ni khyod kyis sbyin par dka'o/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyi zas skom ci yin/ des smras pa/ mi

'phral du bsad pa'i sha dron mo ni za/ khrag dron mo ni 'thung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ de lta bu'i sha khrag ni gsod par ma byas kyi bar du mi rnyed la/ bdag gis legs par smras pa'i don gyi phyir

sems can gzhan su la yang gnod par byed mi phod do snyam nas smras pa/ gal te bdag gi sha khrag khyod za zhing 'thung phod na ni grogs po bdag gis sbyin nus ches kyis/ tshigasu bcad pa tshang bar smros shig dang /

legs par smras pa'i don gyi phyir bdag gis khyod la sha khrag sbyin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigasu bcad pa tshang bar smras pa/ kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /skye ba 'jig pa'i chos can yin/ /skyes

nas 'gag par 'gyur ba te/ /de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas tshigasu bcad pa tshang ba de gus pas mnos nas/ yun ring po zhig tu/ kha don sbyangs nas bsam pa/ 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i

grong khyer gyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sgo yin no/ /'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi lam yin no/ /lam 'das pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad nges par byung ngo snyam nas/

mtshon cha rnon po blangs te smras pa/ grogs po legs par smras pa'i don gyi phyir yon bzhes shig ces byas nas/ brang gi phyogs gcig nas sha bcad de/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can la byin

te smras pa/ grogs po 'drangs sam/ des smras pa/ ma 'drangs so/ /de bzhin du brang gi phyogs ya cig nas sha bcad de phyin no/ /de bzhin du dpung pa'i sha rnams dang / lus thams cad kyi sha bcad cing byin mas smras pa/

grogs po 'drangs sam/ smras pa ma 'drangs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bsam pa/ da ni lus ril gyis yongs su btang ba'i dus kho na la bab bo snyam nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

smon lam btab ste/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/

bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas nas/ tshigasu bcad de smras pa/

sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni/ /srid pa dag tu rang byung sangs rgyas shog /sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral ba'i/ /skye bo phal chen brgal nas bsgrol bar bgyi/ /de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab nas/ smras pa/ grogs po bdag gis lus 'di ci ltar dga' bar gyis shig /de nas byang chub sems dpas sems bskyed ma thag tu sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /

namakha' la 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang me tog gi char phab nas legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po legaso legs so khyod kyis dka' ba'i las byas so zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam
pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dis mchog tu dka' ba byas te/ bdag gis lus 'di snga mkho bzhin du bsgyur bar ni nus mod kyis/ 'on kyang bdag gis 'di nyid kyi spro ba tshod zin par bskyed dgos so snyam nas/
byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ grogs po khyod bdag gis sha rnams gcod cing rgyus pa dang / rtsa brang breng rnams gse ba na/ sems mi dga' ba cung zad tsam skyes sam/ byang chub sems dpas smras

pa/ grogs po bdag gi sha rnams gcod cing / rgyus pa dang rtsa brang breng rnams gse ba na/ sems mi dga' ba cung zad kyang ma skyes kyis/ bdag gis sdug bsngal myong ba na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi

dgas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams 'ba' zhig la/ snying rje'i dbang du gyur to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can gyis smras pa/ grogs po khyod kyi de la su zhig yid ches/ byang chub sems
dpas smras pa/ bdag gis khyod la bden pa bskul ba de lta bus yid ches par bstan to/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ltar khyod kyis bden pa bskul bar chad na/ je khyod bdag gis lus 'di bden pa

bskul bas snga mkho bzhin du gyur cig /de skad smras ma thag tu byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'di ltar bdag gi sha rnams gcod cing / rgyus pa dang rtsa brang breng rnams gseb pa

na/ sems cung zad tsam yang mi dga' mi skyes te/ bdag gis sdug bsngal myong ba na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dagsu skye ba'i sems can rnams 'ba' zhig la snying rje ba'i dbang du gyur na/

bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig de dag gis lus snga ma kho na bzhin du gyur cig ces byas so/ /de skad ces brjod ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus snga ma kho na bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin

yi rangs te/ cha lugs mi snang bar byas nas/ rang bzhin gyi gzugs su bsgyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ smras pa/ bdag gis khyod la gnod pa'i bsam pas mi dga' ba byas pa ni ma

yin gyis/ khyod nyid gyi spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gis khyod mi dga' bar byas par zad do/ /khyod gyi brtson 'grus 'di 'dra ba dang / spro ba 'di 'dra ba las/ gdon mi za bar khyod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyis/ de'i tshe bdag dran par mdzod gcig /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la bzod pa gsol nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar

gyur to/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe rgyal po shi bir gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa/ gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ de'i tshe yang legs par smra bas smra ba dang /

legs par smra bar 'dod par gyur na/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na legs par smra bas smra ba dang / legs par smra bar 'dod par ci ste/ mi mdzad/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag nga ni chos dang po
byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// //shi bi gnyis pa ni/ gtan tshigs dang / sngon gyi rgyu snga ma dang 'dra ba las/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ khyod kyis bdag gi slob

ma byas pas ci la phan/ nga khyod la gnod pa zhig zer gyi/ gal te gnod pa de khyod kyis byed phod na ni/ de'i 'og tu tshigasu bcad pa de ngas khyod la brjod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po

tshigasu bcad pa de brjod cig dang / khyod kyis bdag la gnod pa ci byed du bcug pa de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o/ /grogs po tshigasu bcad pa de tshang bar smros shig dang / de skad ces brjod ma thag tu lha'i dbang po

brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du tshigasu bcad pa de tshang bar brjod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can ga la ba

de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshigasu bcad pa de tshang bar mnos so/ yun ring mo zhig tu kha don sbyangs nas/ khab sor bzhi pa stong shing leb la btsugs pa de lta bu shing leb gnyis kyi bar du bdag

nyid nyal te btsir bar byed do/ /de de na bzhugs bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab te/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa
med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/
bla na med pa lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yi ni/ /srid pa dag
tu rang byung sangs rgyas shog /sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral ba'i/ /skye bo phal chen brgal nas bsgral bar bgyi/ /de nas yang shing leb kyi bar du btsir ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i
lus thams cad la khrag 'bab par gyur nas/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /nam mkha' la 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang me tog gi char phab nas/ legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /lhag ma rnams
ni shi bi'i gtam rgyud snga ma bzhin du bden pas bskul nas/ lus snga ma bzhin du sor chud par gyur pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// //
ko'u sham bi zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sham bi na/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe ko'u sham bi na/ dge slong ma rungs
pa mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing che ba/ 'khor yog mang ba zhig gnas te/ de'i dge slong grogs po mang po gzhan dag kyang yod la/ de dag kyang ma rungs
pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba sha stag go/ /yul yangs pa can gyi dge slong zhig kyang
yul ko'u sham bir 'ongs te/ de yang ma rungs pa/ mthul rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig
la/ de'i dge slong grogs po gzhan dag kyang yod la/ de dag kyang ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing che ba/ g.yog
'khor mang ba sha stag go/ /de nas de de dag dbyar gnas bcas nas/ nang khrims bcas te/ bdag cag gi nang nas gang gis chu ra stong pa ci yang med pa/ chu med pa mthong na de nyid kyis
dgang bar bya'o/ /yang na yo byad kyi zhal da byed pa la sbran par bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang ma bkang yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la yang ma sbran na/ de bdag cag gis gzhi de las nyes pa 'chagasu
gzhug go zhes zer ro/ /de nas der dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams yang dag pa gtan la bab pa na/ tshig rtsub pos 'dres na gcig la cig glags 'ba' zhig lta zhing 'khod do/ /de'i tshe
khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du bshos la spyan drangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong mang pos zhabs rings byas te/ khyim bdag de'i khyim du gshegs
so/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong de chab kung sar song ste/ bkru bshal byas nas/ chu ra'i nang du chu nyung ngu zhig las ma lus par mthong nas
bsam pa/ dge slong thams cad dong zin pas/ da ni su yang chab khung sar 'gro ba rnams med kyis/ chu ra 'di rang gis dgang bar yang mi dgos/ yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la sbran
yang mi dgos so snyam nas/ des chu nyung bzhin du bor te song ngo / /de song nas ring zhig lon pa'i 'og tu/ ko'u sham bi'i dge slong de chab kung sar 'gro bar chas pa
las/ des bltas na chu ra'i nang na chu nyung ngu zhig las med pa mthong nas/ des kyang sngar yangs pa can gyi dge slang des bkru bshal byas te song ba mthong nas/ des bsam pa/ dge

slong 'di ni/ las rnam gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ yang na ni bdag nyid kyis lus 'gengs par byed par 'gyur te/ /yang na ni yo byad kyis zhal ta byed pa la sbron par byed do snyam nas sdod cing 'dug go/ /
de nas de la lhan cig 'khod pa'i slob ma rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po dge slong thams cad ni dong lags na/ khyod 'di na ci la gzhes des smras pa/ bkru bshal byed par 'dod na/ yangs pa can
gyi dge slong des bkru bshal byas te song bas na/ de 'ongs te yang na ni kho bdag gis chu ra 'gengs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ni yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la sbron par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis
smras pa/ mkhan po de 'khor dang bcas pa ni dong lags kyi/ 'dir ma gzhes shig /de nas des chu ra de dge slong rnams la bstan te/ khyod ltos shig chu 'di tsam gyi/ bkru bshal
bya bar rung ngam/ de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod kyis 'di na chu med do zhes de nyi tse zhig gsung shig dang / bdag cag gis khyod kyi rtsa 'dzing dang / mthu dang grogs bgyi'o
zhes byas nas dong ngo / /yangs pa can gyi dge slong de yang 'gyod pa skyes nas/ des lhan cig gnas pa'i slob ma rnams la smras pa/ kye bdag gi 'dir bkru bshal byas
pa las/ chu ra'i nang na chu nyung shas gcig las ma lus bzhin du bor te 'ong la/ dge 'dun gyi nang khrims bcas pa ni yang na bdag nyid kyis dgang bar bya ba dang / yang na yo
byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la sbran dgos pa yin na/ de bdag rang gis kyang ma bkang la/ yo byad gying zhal ta byed pa la yang ma sbran na/ bdag 'dir 'ong pa'i 'og tu dge slong 'ga' zhig bkru
bshal byas par mi 'gyur grang shes byas so/ /de nas de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod kyis ji skad du/ de'i nang na chu yod do zhes nyi tse zhig gsungs shig dang / bdag gis
khyod kyi rtsa 'dzing dang / mthu dang grogs bgyi'o zhes bgyis nas dong ngo / /de nas de dag khyim der zan zos nas phyir dong ngo / /de dag gi nang nas ko'u sham pi pa rnams kyis bsam pa/
yangs pa can gyi dge slong des dge 'dun gyi nang khrim las 'gal bar byas gyis/ des nyes par byas pa'i phyir/ bdag gi nyes pa 'chags su gzhug go snyam ste/ gdan bsham nas
gan d+he brdungs te/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod par gyur nas/ ko'u sham bi'i dge slong des/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong de la gleng ba dang /
des smras pa/ 'di'i nang na chu yod do/ /des smras pa/ chu de tsam gyis bkru bshal byar chog gam zhes byas nas de dag gis de la yul med par bsnyon pa'i phyir dgar ba'i las byas
so/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong de dag gis las de bshags te/ gyes nas gso sbyong gi las logs su byas so/ /de nas gzhi de las de dag 'thab pa dang / 'tshangs 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang /
rtsod par gyur nas de dag 'thabs shing 'tshangs 'drus la/ bkye zhing rtsod nas 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgar bar bcad pa'i dge slong dang / dgar bar bcad pa'i rjesu 'brang ba dang /

dgar bar bcad pa'i rjesu 'brang ba rnams bkug nas/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod par gyur pa bden nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mad lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/

dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyod la rtsod cing ma 'khod cig /dge slong dag khyod 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyer la rtsod par gyur cing 'khod na ni dge ba'i chos rnams 'grib par 'gyur gyis/ 'phel bar

mi 'gyur bar rig par gyis shig /dge slong dag khyed mi 'thab ste/ 'tshang mi 'dru zhing mi 'gyed la/ mi rtsod par 'khod na ni/ dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur gyis 'grib par mi 'gyur bar rig

par gyis shig /dge slong dag gzhan yang dgar bar bcad pa'i dge slong gi ni 'di ltar bya dgos so/ dgar bcad pa'i dge slong ni ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/

rtsa 'dzing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba yin la/ dge slong grogs po mang po gzhan dag kyang ma rungs pa mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'dzing che ba g.yog 'khor mang ba yin nam/

de dag gi bdag la 'dod pa ma yin pas gleng bar byed/ 'dod pa ma yin pas dran par byed kyis/ bdag gis kyang de dag gi nyes pa gleng ba de/ chos bzhin du nyan par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis kyang bdag mi snang bar dgar bar

byed do/ /phyir bcos su med pa dang / phyir 'byung du med par sdig pa'i lta bas dgar bar byed de/ gzhi des na dge 'dun gyi 'thab mo dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang rtsod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/

gleng ba'i dge slong gi nyes pa chos bzhin du phyir bcos na ni legs/ de ltar phyir ma bcos na ni 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgar bcad pa'i dge slong dang / dgar bar bcad pa'i rjesu 'brang ba dang / dgar

bar gcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams btang nas/ dgar bar byed pa'i dge slong dang / dgar bar byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / dgar bar byed pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams bkug nas bka' stsal

pa/ dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste/ dge slong dag 'tshang 'dru zhing rtsod 'gyed la rtsod par gyur pa bden nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mad lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la

rtsod cing ma khod cig /dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod na ni/ dge ba'i chos rnams 'grib par 'gyur gyis 'phel bar mi 'gyur bar rig par gyis shig /dge slong dag khyed mi 'thab ste/ 'tshang

mi 'dru zhing mi 'gyed la/ mi rtsod par 'khod na ni/ dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur gyis/ 'grib par mi 'gyur bar rig par gyis shig /dge slong dag gzhan yang dgar bar byed pa'i dge slong gis 'di ltar bya

dgos so/ /dgar bar byed pa'i dge slong ni ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'dzing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba yin la/ dge slong grogs po mang po gzhan dag kyang ma rungs pa/

mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'dzing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba yin te/ bdag gis de la 'dod pa ma yin pas gleng bar byas/ 'dod pa ma yin pas dran par byas nas/ des

nyes pa de chos bzhin du mnyan par mi byed na/ de bdag gis mi snang bar dgar ba byas te/ phyir bcos su med pa dang / phyir 'byung du med par sdig pa'i stobs dgar bar byas ste/ gzhi des na dge 'dun gyi 'thab mo dang /

'tshang 'dru ba dang 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/ 'dod pa ma yin pas gleng bar ma byed cig /'dod pa ma yin pas dran par ma byed cig /gal te 'dod pa ma yin pas gleng bar byed na

'gal bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kyang / de bzhin du 'thab cing 'tshang 'dru la 'gyed cing rtsod de 'khod nas da dung yang gso sbyong byas par mi rtsi na/ skabs kyi btam de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das

la gsol do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgar bar bcad pa'i dge slong dang / dgar bar bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / dgar bar bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rjesu 'brang ba rnams bkug nas bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste/ 'tshang

'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing ma 'khod cig ces ngas bsgo yang / de bzhin du khyed 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la/ rtsod cing 'khod de da dung yang gso' sbyong bya ba la mi rtsi ba bden nam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mad lagaso/ /dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing

'gyed la rtsod par ma byed cig dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la/ rtsod cing 'khod na ni/ gso sbyong byed dam skabs 'byed pa'i las byed dam/ gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las byed dam/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byed kyang rung ste/ las de dag 'jig par

gyur te/ gzhag dgos pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag khyed ni de dag las tha dad par gnas par byed la de dag kyang khyed las tha dad gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag tha dad par gnas pa ni 'di gnyis yin te/ gang bdag nyid kyis bdag tha dad

par gnas par 'dogs pa dang / gang dge 'dun 'thun pas tha dad par gnas par 'dogs pa'o/ /de la dge slong dag bdag gis bdag tha dad du gnas par 'dogs pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar dge slong gis shes bzhin du chos bzhin gyi phyogs/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i phyogs

yin par 'jog pa de lta bu ni/ bdag gis bdag tha dad par gnas par 'dogs pa yin no/ /dge 'dun gyi chos bzhin du tha dad par 'dogs pa ci lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong mi snang bar dgar bar byas te/ phyir bcos su med pa dang / phyir 'byung du med par

sdig pa'i lta bas dgar bar byed pa ste/ de lta bu ni dge 'dun gyi tha dad par gnas par 'dogs pa yin no/ /dge slong dag lhan cig tu gnas pa ni 'di gnyis yin te/ gang bdag gi bdag lhan cig tu gnas par 'dogs pa dang / dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin lhan cig gnas par

'dogs pa'o/ /de la bdag gis bdag la lhan cig tu gnas par 'dogs pa ci lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar dge slong gis shes bzhin du chos bzhin du ma yin pa'i phyogs la chos bzhin gyi phyogs yin par 'jog pa ste/ de lta bu ni bdag gis bdag lhan cig tu gnas par 'dogs pa

yin no/ /dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du lhan cig gnas par 'dogs pa ci lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong mi snang bar dgar bar bya ste/ phyir bcos su med pa dang / phyir 'byung du med par sdig pa'i lta bas dgar bar byed pa ste/ de lta bu ni dge 'dun gyis chos

bzhin du lhan cig tu gnas par 'dogs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgar bar bcad pa'i dge slong dang / dgar bar bcod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / dgar bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams btang nas/ dgar bar byed pa'i dge slong dang / dgar

bar byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams bkug nas bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyed 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'bru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing ma 'khod cig ces ngas bsgo na yang / de bzhin du khyed 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod de da dung gso sbyong

byas pa la gso sbyong byas par mi rtsi ba bden nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mad lags so zhes byas nas/ de lta bu'i dge 'dun gyi chos bzhin du lhag tu gnas par 'dogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de ltar de dag la bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal kyang de bzhin du 'thab cing 'tshang 'dru la 'gyed cing rtsod de 'khod do/ /de nas khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du bshos la spyan drangs nas/ dge slong de dag der dong ngo / /de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das

kyis yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la bshos 'dir drong shig ces bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam rnam pa lnga'i phyir/ yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la bshos len du 'jug par byed do/ nang du yang dag par 'jog

par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang / nad pa gzigs par bzhed pa dang / mal stan gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nyan thos rnams la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa rnams kyi phyir ro/ /skabs 'dir ni bcom

ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'i phyir ro/ /yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la bshos len du gtang ngo / /de nas dge slong mang po khyim der dong ba rnams stan la 'khod nas 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod par gyur to/ /de dag

'thab ste 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod do/ /'tshams pa ma yin pa'i lus dang / mtshams ma yin pa'i ngag gi las byed cing 'dug la/ ci tsam na rdeg par byed do/ /de nas bshos len du song bas bshos blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la

ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod de 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos len pa'i dge slong de la bka' stsal pa dge slong ci dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas mang pos

tshim par gyur tam/ gsol pa btsun pa de ni de lags ste/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la kha zas mang pos ni tshim par gyur lags na/ btsun pa 'on kyang dge slong mang pos khyim der mchis pa rnams 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod par gyur to/ /

de dag 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod de/ mtshams pa ma lags pa'i lus kyi las dang / mtshams pa ma lags pa'i ngag gi las bgyid cing 'khod la ci tsam na brdegs par yang bgyid do zhes gsol to/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gtsug lag khang gi nang du gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyed ma red nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/

dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gang la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /gdan la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed khyim der dong ba rnams 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod par

gyur nas khyed 'thab ste/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod de/ mtshams ma yin pa'i lus kyis las dang / mtshams ma yin pa'i ngag gi las byed cing 'khod la/ ci tsam na brdeg par yang byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad

lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag der deng ba la dge slong sde sder chad pa rnams la khrimasu bya ba'i chos rnams ngas bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sde sder chad pa rnams kyis rtsod pa'i

btsugs kyi gnas so chog spong shig /dge slong tha mal pa la 'dug pa rnams kyis ni dge slong sde sder chad pa rnams dang / nyin par yang rung / mtshan mo yang rung / nang par yang rung / dro la yang rung ste/ gtsug lag khang gcig gam/ dgon pa 'am/

grong 'dab gcig tu gnas par ma byed cig /lhan cig tu yang gnas par ma byed cig /lhan gcig tu yang ma 'gro shig /lam gcig du yang ma 'grogs shig /brda' yang ma byed cig /brda' skad kyang ma byed cig /tha mal par gnas

pas/ rtsod pa'i gtsug de khongs su chud nas/ chos bzhin dang 'dul ba bzhin du zhi bar byed nus la/ ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ 'thun par byed nus na ni zhi ba'i byed pa'i 'thab dag cing / 'dul ba dang 'thun pa gcig gis
rtsod pa'i gcugs de zhi bar byas pa zhes bya'o/ /las brgya tham pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //las brgya tham pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //
This is a blank page without text
'dzangs blun zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ dpe sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga ta'i
dkyil 'khor rnam par rgyal ba na bzhugs te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring por ma lon pa zhig na 'di snyam du dgongs par gyur to/ /sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas phyin ci log gis

yongs su bslad de/ bstan cing bcos su yang shin tu dka' bas/ ji srid du 'jig rten na bzhugs kyang phan pa'i don med kyis/ des na lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o snyam du

dgongs ma thag tu/ de'i tshe na tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes shing rtogs nas/ nam mkha' las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ der phyin pa dang / zhabs

la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol zhing bskul ba dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs ris kyi lha dag sems

can 'di dag nyes pa'i dri mas yongs su glags te/ 'jig rten gyi bde ba la chags nas/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i sems med pas/ ci srid du 'jig rten na bzhugs kyang bya ba don med par 'gyur te/ mya ngan las

'das na bde'o snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs su gang ba/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa
bstan cing 'dul ba'i dus la yang bab/ sems can 'di dag las grol bar 'gyur ba yang shin tu mang na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs te/ shin tu mdongs par gyur pa 'di dag

gi mgon dang skyabs mi mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang sngon bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po chen po ka na shi ni pa li zhes bya ba zhig rgyal phran mang po

la dbang bgyid de/ grong khyer ni brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed la mnga' mdzad/ btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas ni stong phrag nyi shu mnga' ste/ blon po chen po yang stong phrag bcu snyed yod do/ /rgyal po de shin tu snying rje

dang ldan pas/ mi la sogs pa skye bo mang po'i pha ma lta bur gyur to/ /de'i tshe rgyal po des 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag kyang 'gro ba mang po kun gyi gtso bor gyur la/ skye bo mang po 'di dag kyang bdag la mos
shing dga' bas/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos kyi nor bu rin po che thams cad la phan gdags so snyam du bsam nas/ blon po cig gis thams cad du bkar btags te/ su la dam pa'i chos mchis pa bdag la ston par

gyur na/ ci dang ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du sbyin no zhes bsgo ba dang / de'i tshe na bram ze le'u du ci zhes bgyi ba zhig pho brang gi sgor mchis te/ bdag la dam pa'i chos yod do zhes smras so/ /rgyal po des de skad ces
thos nas/ phyi rol tu bsus te/ phyag byas nas stan bting ba la bzhag go/ /bram ze de stan bting ba la 'dug nas/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas thal mo sbyar nas/ ston pa chen po/ gti mug
gis mdongs par gyur pa la dam pa'i chos dbye zhing bstan pa'i dus la bab bo zhes bskul ba dang / bram ze des rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gis shes pa 'di nyid gyi 'da' tsam gyis lobs
pa ma yin pas/ thos par 'dod na 'di tsam gyis chog pa ma yin no/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ci dang ci 'dod pa smros shig dang / thams cad yid bzhin du sbyin no zhes smras pa dang / bram ze des rgyal po
la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyi lus la mar me stong btsugs te/ mchod pa byed nus na chos bstan par bya'o zhes smras pa dang / rgyal po de lhag par dga' mgu rangs nas/ de'i tshe

pho nya cig ban glang rgyang grags brgya stong du phyin pa gcig bskyon te/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /rgyal po ka na shi ni pa li de ste zhag bdun na chos kyi phyir lus kyi sha phug ste/ mar me stong

'dzugs so zhes rgyal phran dang mi thams cad la bsgo'o/ /de dag gis de skad bsgo ba thos pa dang / so so nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te/ rgyal po gang na ba der lhags nas/ /phyag byas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /

'jig rten 'di ni ci tsam 'tsho ba'i srog dang bcas pa thams cad rgyal po khyod la brten pa ni/ long ba dmigs bu la brten pa 'am/ bu chung ma la brten pa dang 'dra na/ rgyal po mi bzhugs pa'i slad du na/ gang la

skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ gal te sku la mar me stong gtsugs na/ gdon mi za bar srog dang bral na/ ci'i slad du bram ze cig tsam gyi slad du 'jig rten 'di'i sems can yongs su btang bar dgongs/ de'i tshe na

btsun mo dang / sras dang rgyal tshab dang / slas lnga brgya dang / blon po stong phrag bcu snyed kyis thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba btab kyang / rgyal po yi dam la brtan pas ma bzlog ste/ nam nga mngon par sangs rgyas pa

na/ khyod rnams gdon mi za bar bsgral lo zhes smras pa dang / de'i tshe na skye bo mang pos rgyal po de yi dam la brtan par de dag gis rtogs nas/ rab tu mi dga' ste/ cho nges btab nas sa la 'gyel to/ /rgyal po de'i
bsam pa ma 'gyur te bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so/ /nga'i lus la mar me stong gzug pa'i dus la bab kyis/ phug cig ces bsgo ba dang / des rgyal po'i lus phug nas mar me'i snying po snum gyis bskus
pa dang / 'khor mang pos de ltar gyur pa de dag mthong nas/ ri 'gyel ba bzhin du lus sa la brdabs so/ /de nas rgyal pos bram ze la ston pa chen po thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ sngar bdag
la chos bstan nas/ de'i 'og tu mar me tshugs shig /gal te tshe'i dus byas na/ chos thos par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / bram zes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rtag pa thams cad zad

par 'gyur/ /mtho ba de yang mthar lhung ngo / /'du ba yod na bral bar 'ong / /skye ba yod na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras ma thag tu/ rgyal po de dga' mgu rangs te/ 'gyod pa'i sems
med bzhin du 'di skad ces dam bcas so/ /bdag chos tshol ba 'di yang sangs rgyas su bsgrub pa'i phyir te/ phyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ ye shes kyi 'od kyis sems can gti mug gis mdongs
pa rnams shin tu snang bar gyur cig ces yi dam bcas ma thag tu gnam sa yang rab tu g.yos so/ /gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i pho brang gi bar du g.yos pas/ lha de dag nam mkha' las babs te/ lus kyi
mchod pa'i gnas su lhags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus de ltar zhig pa lha de dag gis mthong nas/ steng gi nam mkha' yongs su gang ba de dag 'dus te/ ngus pa'i mchi ma char bzhin du bab nas/ lha

rdzas kyi me tog kyang char bzhin du bab ste/ mchod pa byas so/ /de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang rgyal po gang na ba der 'ongs nas/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bstod bsngags te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen
po 'di ltar shin tu sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa 'di la sems 'gyod par ma gyur tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'gyod pa med do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lus 'dar zhing nyams mi bde
bzhin du 'gyod pa med ces smras pa 'di cis yid ches par 'gyur/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te bdag thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du 'gyod pa'i sems med pa yin na/ lus kyi rma 'di snga ma bzhin du sos par

gyur cig ces smras ma thag du lus snga ma kho na bzhin du rma med par gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po de ni sangs rgyas lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sngon yang sems can gyi slad du mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal dang

bsdos te chos brnyes na/ da ci'i slad du 'gro ba thams cad chos kyi snang ba dang / bral bar yongs su btang ste mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sngon 'das pa'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir

rgyal po chen po bying ling gar li zhes bgyi bar gyur pa na/ rgyal phran rnams la dbang bgyid de/ grong khyer ni brgyad khri bzhi stong dang ldan/ btsun mo dang phro brang gi slas ni stong phrag nyi shu mnga' ste/ rgyal tshab dang rgyal

bu ni lnga brgya ste/ blon po chen po stong phrag bcu mnga'o/ /rgyal po de snying rje dang ldan pas 'bangs thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar dgongs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po de dam pa'i chos la mos shing dga' bas

blon po cig la bsgos nas 'di skad ces bkar btags so/ /gang su yang rung ba la/ mdo sde'am dam pa'i chos yod pa bdag la bstan par gyur na/ ci dang ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du sbyin no zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas bram

ze'i le'u ngu chu zhes bya ba pho brang gi sgor 'ongs nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag la dam pa'i chos yod do/ gang thos par 'dod pa la bstan par bya'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / rgyal po bdag nyid rab tu dga'

mgu rangs te/ phyi rol tu bsus nas rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig snyan par smras nas/ pho brang gi nang du khrid de/ de stan bting ba la bzhag nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /ston pa chen
po bdag la dam pa'i chos bstan du gsol/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag gis lus kun du sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong nas yun yang ring po zhig lon te/ gdod lobs pas/ rgyal po chen po thos

par 'dod na/ 'di tsam gyis chog pa ma yin no/ /rgyal pos thal mo sbyar te/ ci dang ci 'dod pa smros shig dang / ston pa khyod la mi 'phongs par thams cad 'bul lo/ /bram zes smras pa/ gal te khyod kyi lus la

lcags gzer stong gis btab na/ khyod la chos sbyin no zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de ste zhag bdun na dngos po 'di dag bsgrub bo zhes smras so/ /de'i tshe na rgyal po des pho nya

bzhi glang po che rgyang grags brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed du 'gro ba zhig la bskyon te/ 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /rgyal po chen po byi ling gi ra lis/ de ste zhag bdun na lus la lcags gzer stong gis

'debs so zhes bsgo ba dang / blon po dang 'gro ba mang pos thos nas thams cad rgyal po'i drung du lhags te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag phyogs bzhi na 'khod pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rgyal po'i yon tan dang /

bka' drin gyis so so nas bde ba dang skyid pa la longs spyod de/ rgyal po chen po da bdag gi slad du gsol ba btab ste/ sku la lcags gzer stong gis mi gdab du gsol zhes gsol pa/ de'i tshe na btsun mo dang /

pho brang gi slas dang / rgyal tshab dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po thams cad kyis kyang gsol ba btab ste/ rgyal po chen po bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ mi gcig gi slad du sku tshe'i dus mdzad cing

'bangs thams cad spang ba mi rigs so/ /de la rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni yun ring po nas 'khor ba na lus grangs med pa chud gsan te/ bar 'ga' ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis

lus 'di bsad pa'i rus pa dkar po spungs pa ni ri rab bas kyang mtho/ mgo bcad pa'i khrag gzags pa ni chu klung lnga bas kyang che/ ngus pa'i mchi ma ni rgya mtsho bzhi bas kyang lhag ste/ de ltar rnam pa sna
tshogs kyi sgo nas kyang lus srog chud gsan nas kyang / lan 'ga' yang chos kyi phyir ma yin te/ da bdag gis gzer bu btab la sangs rgyas su bsgrub po/ /phyis mngon par sangs rgyas nas shes rab

kyi ral gris khyed kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nad bcad par byed na/ ci'i phyir nga'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bar du gcod par byed ces smras pa dang / de nas 'khor mang po rnams kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal

pos bram ze la smras pa/ ston pa chen po thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ sngar chos bstan nas de'i 'og tu lcags gzer gyis thob cig /gal te tshe'i dus byas na chos thos par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / bram
ze des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag ste/ /skye ba thams cad sdug bsngal bcas/ /chos kun stong pas bdag po med/ /bdag gi ba yang yod ma yin/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras

nas/ /lus la lcags gzer stong gis btab bo/ /de'i tshe na rgyal phran dang / blon po dang / 'khor mang po rnams kyis de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas/ ri chen po 'gyel ba bzhin du lus sa la brdabs te/ ngus
nas ci yang mi dran par sa la 'gre'o/ /de'i tshe na gnam sa rnam pa drug du g.yos nas/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thams cad nam mkha' las babs nas/

byang chub sems dpa' de'i drung du lhags te/ de ltar chos kyi phyir sdug bsngal chen po lus kyis myong bar mthong nas/ thams cad ngus te mchi ma char bzhin du bab nas lha rdzas kyi me tog gis mchod par byas so/ /

de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang po rgyal po gang na ba der 'ongs nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams te/ sdug bsngal la ci mi snyam pa 'di chos kyi phyir ram/ 'on te ma
yin/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dod dam/ 'on te bdud kyi rgyal po 'am/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'am/ dbang phyug chen po 'dod ces smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag gis byas pa 'di ni khams

gsum gyi bde ba myong 'dod pa ma yin gyi/ bsod nams ci snyed yod pa 'di sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ bdag gis bltas na rgyal po'i lus 'dar zhing mi bzod pa la bltas na/ 'di skad

ces zer zhing 'gyod pa med ces smras pa 'di cis yid ches par 'gyur/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te bdag gis smras pa bden te/ 'gyod pa'i sems med na/ bdag gi lus snga ma kho na bzhin du rma med par gyur cig

ces smras ma thag tu snga ma kho na bzhin du gyur nas/ lha dang mi rnams dga' mgu rangs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs shing yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan na/ ci'i slad du 'gro

ba mang po yongs su btang ste/ chos kyang mi bshad par mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i pha rol na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir

rgyal po chen po tshangs pa lha zhes bgyi ba la/ rgyal tshab dam gam zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis te/ rgyal bu de dam pa'i chos la mos shing dga' bas dam pa'i chos phyogs kun tu btsal na yang ma rnyed nas/ mya ngan gyis
