mi des bos pa'i sgra thos nas phan tshun du bltas na ci yang mi snang nas lam du zhugs te song song ba las sbrul gyis yang 'bod de kyai kho bo'i drung du yang bsnyen cig ces smras pa dang / /mi des smras pa/
khyod kyis kho bo bos te ci zhig bya/ khyod ni shin tu gdug pa can yin pas kho bo bsad du 'ong ngo / /sbrul gyis smras pa/ kho bos gnod pa bya na khyod drung du ma 'ong kyang gnod pa bya nus so/
zhes smras pa dang / mi de skrag nas sbrul gyi drung du bsten to/ /sbrul gyis smras pa/ kho bo la 'di na gser bum pa cig yod kyis/ khyod la bsod nams shig bya bar bcol bar nus sam/ ci ste ma

byas na khyod la gnod par bya'o/ /mi des kho bos nus so zhes smras pa dang / sbrul gyis mi de gser gyi bum pa'i drung du khrid de/ gser gyi bum pa cig bskur te 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod gser 'di khyer
la dge 'dun rnams la mchod ston gsol cig /mchod ston gsol ba'i nyin par kho bo yang 'ong gis bsus shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas mi des gser khur te dge 'dun gyi nang du song nas/ dge slong gtsang
sbyor la gser phul te 'di ni sbrul gdug pa zhig gi gser lags kyi gser 'dis dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol cig ces mchi'o/ /gser 'dis mchod ston sbyar te/ de nas mchod ston nam gsol ba zhag
dus brtsis nas/ de'i nyin par mi de gzeb thogs ste/ sbrul gdug pa de gang na 'dug pa der song ngo / /sbrul gdug pa des kyang mi de 'ong ba mthong nas rab tu dga' bar gyur to/ /mi des sbrul de gzeb

kyi nang du bcug nas khyer te song ba las lam du mi cig dang phrad de/ mi des khyod gang nas 'ongs shes lan gsum gyi bar du dris kyang sbrul thogs pa des cang ma smras pas/ sbrul khros nas gdug pa phyung ba las
yang 'di snyam bsams so/ /mi 'di ci zhig nyes na/ pha rol pos lan gsum gyi bar dris na gtam gyi lan yang mi ster snyam ste/ phyir yang khros nas gdug pa byung ba las phyir dgag ste/

yang 'di snyam du bsams so/ /mi 'di bdag gi phyir bsod nams byed na/ byas pa gzo ba'i drin yang dran pa byas par gdug pa mi 'byung ngo snyam bsams te/ mi 'dis bdag la phan pa'i don byed kyi nyes pa zhig
byas na yang bzod par bya'o/ /zhes sa dben par phyin pa dang / re shig sa la zhog shig ces smras nas sbrul des mi de la sems smad de/ da bdag gi nyes pa 'gyod cing gshags so zhes smras na/ phyir yang
khur te/ dge 'dun gyi gnas su phyin pa dang / dge 'dun dag kyang gdugs tshod kyi dus la bab pas/ mi des dge 'dun la me tog brims te/ sbrul de dang ba'i sems kyi me tog 'grem pa la lta'o/ /
de nas dge 'dun dag zas kyi bya ba byas nas kha lag bkrus nas de la chos bshad do/ /sbrul de rab tu dga' nas/ gser gyi bum pa drug kyang dge 'dun la phul te/ bsod nams kyi las byas nas de
nas tshe 'phos so/ /tshe'i dus byas nas de'i bsod nams kyis sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes so/ /kun dga' bo de'i tshe na sbrul gdug pa khur du khyer ba'i mi de ni nga yin no/ /sbrul gdug
pa de ni shA ri'i bu yin no/ /'das pa'i dus na yang khur du khyer ba las sbrul gyis spyos te/ de la yang sems smad pas da yang dge slong rnams la sems smad pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo la sogs pa
sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/ /gser gyi bum pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i

khab bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yul de na bram ze shin du dbul zhing 'phongs pa ci yang mi bdog pa zhig yod de/ bram ze 'phongs
ches nas kun la ci ltar bya na tshe 'di la longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur zhes dris so/ /de la mi zhig gis smras pa/ ci khyod mi shes sam/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba da ltar 'jig rten du
gshegs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don mdzad do/ /de'i nye gnas 'od srung chen po dang maud gal ya na dang / shA ri'i bu dang / ma 'gags pa la sogs pa 'phags pa bzhi yang rtag tu dbul

'phongs pa la phan pa'i don byed kyis/ gal te khyod dad pa'i sems kyis 'phags pa de dag la zhal zas kyis mchod na/ 'phags pa de dag gis tshe 'di nyid la ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag dang ldan par mdzad do zhes

smras so/ /de'i tshe na de la bram zes mi des smras pa thos nas/ rab tu dga' ste kun tu rgyu zhing slong mo dang / gla zos nas nor cung zad cig snyed de phyir khyim du 'ongs nas zhal zas sbyar te 'phags pa'i dge 'dun

rnams spyan drangs nas/ bshos gsol te 'jig rten 'di la phan par re'o/ /de'i tshe na bram ze de'i chung ma bde ba zhes bya ba des dge 'dun la bshos gsol nas nyin zhag gcig pa'i bslab tshigs mnos so/ /de'i

tshe na rgyal po gsal rgyal 'chags su song ba las/ phyir 'ong ba'i lam du nyes pa byas pa'i btson zhig lam kha na shing la bcings shing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /btson des rgyal po gshegs pa mthong nas/ ngus te bzas

zhig bslangs pa dang / rgyal pos kyang sbyin no zhes byas pa dang / phyir pho brang du gshegs pa dang / brjed pa las de'i nub mo nam phyed tsam na btson la kha zas sbyin pa dran te/ kha zas bskyal bar byas nas/

pho brang nang gi mi ni gcig kyang 'gro 'phod pa med de/ nam ma phyed tsam na kha zas bskur du lam na 'dre gdon dang / srin po'i 'jigs pas srog dang bsdos te 'gro nus pa med do/ /de'i tshe na rgyal pos mi de'i

sdug bsngal ba dang bkres pas nyen pa dran nas/ de la shin tu snying brtse nas/ nga'i yul 'di nas su zhig btson de la kha zas bskyal du nus na/ gser srang stong sbyin no/ /zhes bsgrags kyang 'gro nus pa ma byung ngo / /

de'i tshe na bram ze de'i chung ma bde ba des gtam du thos na/ 'jig rten pa su yang rung ste nyin cig pa'i bslab tshig brgyad mnos nas 'dre gdon la sogs pas mi brdzi ste/ gdon thams cad kyis gnod pa byed
mi nus so zhes thos kyis/ bdag ni rgyal pos gar btang bar kho mo 'gro snyam bsams nas mchis so/ /de nas rgyal pos bde ba la khyod kha zas 'di dag khyer la che ge mo zhig na btson 'dug pa de la byin
cig dang / gser srang stong byin pa de bcas so de nas bde ba rgyal po'i bka' bzhin du kha zas thogs te/ tshul khrims dran par byas nas/ lam du zhugs te song song ba las/ grong khyer gyi phyir

rol tu srin mo lam pa dang phrad do/ /de'i tshe na srin mo de'i bu lnga brgya gsar du btsas pas bkres skom gyis nyen te/ bde ba 'ong ba mthong nas/ bza' bar gzas te/ de'i tshe na dge bsnyen ma tshul khrims ma nyams

pas srin mos mthong nas skrag ste/ dge bsnyen ma khyod khyer ba'i kha zas las cung zad cig bslang ngo zhes smras pa dang / dge bsnyen mas kyang nyung ngu zhig byin te byin pa nyung mod kyi dge bsnyen ma'i mthus mang du sprul pas

srin mo ma smad shin tu 'drangs par gyur to/ /de nas srin mos dge bsnyen ma la khyod ci ming zhes dris pa dang / kho mo ni bde ba'o zhes smras so/ /'o na kho mo ma smad kyang ltogs pa las khyod kyis gsos kyis/ kho mo 'dug pa

'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyis phyir log pa'i lam du khyer cig /khyod phar 'gro na kho mo'i nu mo a lam pa yang lam kha na 'dug ste/ khyod dang phrad kyis kho mo'i 'phrin du khyod bde 'am/ kho mo yang bu lnga brgya
bde bar btsas so zhes gyis shig /de nas dge bsnyen ma lam du zhugs te song song ba las ring por ma lon par a lam pa dang phrad do/ /a lam pa la phu mo'i phrin spring ba dang / bu lnga brgya bde bar
btsas so zhes gtam byas nas/ a lam pa dga' ste dge bsnyen ma khyod kho mo'i pha ma'i 'phrin dang gtam snyan pa byas pa legs kyis/ kho mo 'dug pa'i gnas 'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyis phyir log pa'i
lam du khyer cig /kho mo cag gi ming po cig kyang lam kha na 'dug gi/ de dang 'phrad na kho mo cag spun gnyis kyi 'phrin dang / bu lnga brgya btsas pa'i gtam yang gyis shig ces bsgo nas song ngo / /

de nas yun ring por ma phyin par sring mo gnyis kyi ming po 'phrad de/ de la bu mo gnyis kyis 'phrin dang / bu lnga brgya bde bar btsas pa'i gtam byas nas de yang rab tu dga' ste/ khyod kho bo'i sring
mo gnyis kyi gtam dang phrin byas pa legs kyis/ kho bo 'dug pa'i gnas 'dir/ gser bum pa gang yod kyis phyir log pa'i lam tu khyer shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas dge bsnyen ma chas te
song song ba las btson de'i drung du phyin te/ kha zas bsnyod nas phyir log pa'i lam du gser bum pa gsum rnyed do/ /rgyal pos kyang gser srang stong bya dgar byin pas/ bram ze dbul mo khyo
shug gnyis yul de na shin tu phyug cing nor mang bar gyur pas/ lhag par bsod nams byed cing rin po che mang bar gyur to/ /rgyal pos kyang bsod nams las gyur par shes nas blon por bcug ste
shin tu phyug par gyur te/ lhag par bsod nams byed pa la dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun spyan drangs te/ mchod pa chen po byas so/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan
pas sems rnam par grol te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'khor mang po de rnams dang kun dga' bo la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/ /
bram ze mo bde ba'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // bam po brgyad pa/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun

brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i g.yog gcig dgos so zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas kun shes kauN+Di n+ya

stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsnyen bkur yid bzhin du bgyi zhing chos gos dang lhung

bzed bzung ngo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kauN+Di n+ya la khyod kyang rgas 'khogs te/ khyod nyid la yang bsnyen bkur byed pa yang dgos kyis/ kauN+Di n+ya khyod stan la 'dug shig ces bka' stsal to/ /

de bzhin du 'od srung dang / shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal ya na chen po la sogs te nye gnas lnga brgya snyed kun gyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol na yang gcig kyang ma gnang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan

pa ma 'gags pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i dge slong gang la bgyi snyam brtags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kun dga' bo la dgyes pa ni 'di lta ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas

nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba/ nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar cing lhan pa bzhin du thugs kun dga' bo la dgongs zhing dgyes par nye gnas kun gyis rtogs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu chen po gnyis

kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang kun dga' bo dang lhan cig tu yid mgu zhing bde ba'i gtam rnam pa du ma byas nas/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal ya

nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya bar dad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyang khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar dgyes te/ de bzhin

gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na khyod la phan pa'i don cher 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi dad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsgrub
par dka' bzod par dka'o/ /'di lta ste me 'bar ba ni bsgrub par yang dka'/ bzod par yang dka' ba yin te de ltar de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par dka' bas na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das
la bsnyen bkur bgyis par mi dad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal ya na chen pos kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kun dga' bo khyod la bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing dgyes pa ni 'di lta ste/

khang bu brtsegs pa'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung nas nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos na shar cing lhan pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyang kun dga' bo khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar
dgyes kyi/ dad par gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na/ khyod la phan pa'i don cher 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal ya na chen po ci ste/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis
'dod pa 'di gsum gnang na bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod do/ /'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das gsol ba'i na bza' bdag la 'tshal du mi stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i

bshos kyi lhag ma bdag mi 'tshal ba dang / bdag dus ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchir gnang bar bgyis na ni/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par dad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang

maud gal ya na chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsnyen bkur byed par 'dod par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gis bcom ldan
'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi bar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dad pa bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la 'dod pa 'di gsum gnang na/ gdod bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par dad do zhes

mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa legs so/ /maud gal ya na dge slong kun dga' bo de ni mkhas pa can te/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams smad pa'i tshig dang rjes su smad pa'i tshig gis chos kyi

phyir byung bar mthong bas na/ bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'di skad dge slong kun dga' bo ni gos dang zas kyi phyir ston pa la bsnyen bkur byed do zhes smra bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /maud gal gyi

bu de ni dge slong kun dga' bo ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /dge slong kun dga' bo de ni mkhas pa can te/ dus shes shing rig pa legs te/ dus shes par 'gyur ba ni bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnam bzhi lta

bar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang / dus la ma bab pa dang / gzhan yang mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang dus la ma bab pa dang / gzhan yang mu stegs can kun tu rgyu

'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la lan ldon par spobs so/ /'di dag ni lan ldon par mi spobaso/ /bca' ba dang bza' ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la bde zhing bsod par 'gyur/ 'di ni bde zhing bsod par mi 'gyur bar shes

pa'i phyir maud gal gyi bu dge slong kun dga' bo 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /de nas shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed par byas nas dad par byas pa dang / bcom ldan

'das kyis kyang kun dga' bo mkhas pa can te/ dus shes shing dus rig go zhes bsngags pas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge slong kun dga' bo 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis dus tshod la mkhas par gyur/

bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i pha rol tu rgyal po chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo / /de'i tshe grong khyer ba ru te zhes bya ba na bram ze n+ya gro

d+ha ces bya ba zhig yod do/ mkhas pa rig pa dang ldan pa dang sman dang gtsug lag dang / skar ma la mkhas pa zhig pas/ rgyal po de'i ston pa byed de rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kyang de la rgyal po chen po dang 'dra bar bsnyen bkur byed de bsgo ba'i tshig kyang

nyan to/ /bram ze de phyug khyad kyang rnam thos kyi bu dang 'gran te/ de la bud med pas rtag tu mi chud ste/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las ji ltar byas na bu yod par 'gyur zhes tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang dbang phyug dang / nyi zla dang skar ma dang ri dang /

chu dang / nags kyi lha kun la mchod cing brjod do/ /lo bcu gnyis lon nas chung ma chen mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /bud med mkhas pa dag ni sems can dang ldan ma thag tu bu khye'u 'am bu mo yin par nges par rtogs pas/ de yang khye'u yin

par shes pas bram ze la gtam smras so/ /bram zes de skad smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' mgu rangs te chung ma'i rim 'gro lhag par ches bskyed do/ /de nas zla ba dgu tshang nas bu khye'u zhig btsas nas/ gser gyi mdog can skra mthon thing du 'dug pa

bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ mtshan dang ldan pa zhig go/ /de nas btsas ston byas nas mtshan mkhan bkug ste mtshan la bltas nas ming sbyin pa chen po zhes bya bar bdagaso/ /khye'u de ni rims kyi cher skyes nas dbyar rgun dang / ston dpyid kyi gnas kyang so

sor byas te/ longs spyod byed du bcug go/ /khye'u de yang yid gzhungs zhing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa zhig pas rig byed dang gtsug lag rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs te/ rgyu rtsal gang yang mi shes pa med do/ /phyis sbyin pa chen pos pha ma la

gsol pa/ bdag phyi rol tu 'chag cing bltad mo ltar 'gro'o zhes pa dang / de'i pha mas kyang bu 'chag du 'gro'o zhes lam srang phyag bdar byed du bcug ste/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas me tog gis gtor te/ bdug

spos kyi bdug pa la sogs pa yo byad mang po bshams nas/ sbyin pa chen po glang po che rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa la bskyon te/ dril bsgrags/ rnga brdungs/ rol mo sil snyan dkrol te/ brgya brgya stong snyed kyis bskor nas/

grong khyer gyi phyi rol du dong ngo / /yul mi thams cad kyi lam kyi g.yas g.yon du khang bu brtsegs pa'i steng nas mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing 'di'i byin dang gzi brjid ni tshangs pa dang 'dra'o zhes bsgrags go/ /de nas song song ba

las mu to ba dag gos hrul po gyon zhing snod chag pa dag thogs te/ cung zad bslang ngo zhes 'bod pa sbyin pa chen pos thos nas/ de dag la khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar nyon mongs shing sdug pa dris so/ /de la kha cig ni 'di skad du bdag

cag la pha ma dang / phu nu dang bud med dang gnyen bshes ma mchis pas sdug go zhes zer ro/ /de la kha cig ni bdag yun ring du nad kyis btab pas mi sos te sdug zhes zer ro/ /de la kha cig ni bdag bag ma byas pas chom

pos bcoms te/ ci yang mi bdog pas slong mo byed do zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos de skad smras pa thos nas mchi ma bkrug te song ngo / /de nas yang pha zad cig na shan pa dag srog chags bsad nas pags pa
bshu ba dang / dmyal gtub pa dag mthong ngo / /sbyin pa chen pos e ma ho 'di dag ci byed dris na/ bdag cag ni pha mes rgyud kyi 'di 'dra ba'i gsod pa'i las byed de/ 'di ma byas na mi

'tsho'o zhes zer ro/ /de la sbyin pa chen pos ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ lta mi phod par song ngo / /de nas pha zad du phyin pa dang / zhing pa dag cig zhing rmos te/ zhing rmos pa'i shul du srin bu mang du

byung ba las bya mang po dag sbu dag thu zhing za ba dang de dag ni ci byed ces dris na bdag cag ni zhing rmos te sa klog pa'i shul du sa bon btab nas phyis mang du skyes te/ des mang du 'tsho zhing rgyal po'i phyir yang 'bul

lo zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos de la yang ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ pha zad song ba dang / rngon pa dag bya rgya bres pa dang snyi btsugs nas/ bya rnams bshor ba dang sems can dag bya rgya dang snyis zin nas lus brdabs

shing then kyang ma shor te snying rje'i skad phyung ste shin tu 'jigs skrag pa dag mthong nas/ khyod ci byed dris na bdag cag kyang rgyud kyi 'di 'dra ba gsod pa'i las byed pas 'tsho'o zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos

de skad smras pa thos nas/ shin tu yi mug ste/ yang pha zad song ba dang / nya pa dag nya rgya btsug pa dang mang du zin te/ thang la phung po spungs nas da dung yang 'gul ba dag mthong nas/ 'di dag ci byed ces dris na/ bdag

cag rgyud kyis las gzhan med do/ /'di ltar nya bshor zhing 'tsho'o zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos 'di lta bu dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsamaso/ /sems can 'di dag ni dbul zhing 'phongs pas bgo ba dang /

bza' ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba'i las gsod pa la stsogs pa byed de/ 'di dag ni tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du lhung ste mun pa nas mun par 'gro zhing thar pa'i dus med do snyam bsams nas phyir

'ongs te nyin mtshan du de sems shing mi dga' nas pha'i drung du song ste/ pha la bdag gsol pa zhig mchis kyis gnong shig ces smras so/ /phas kyang bu khyod ci zer smras pa bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so/ /yab

bdag sngon gyi phyi rol tu 'chag tu mchi mchi ba las/ mi mang pos gos dang zas kyi phyir thams cad nyon mongs te/ gcig la gcig gsod pa dang / brdzun dang dbang za ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pa

mthong nas de dag la sbyin pa bgyid par bsam gyi/ yab kyi bang mdzod chen po las phongs pa dag gi phyir yid bzhin du sbyor du gnong shig /phas smras pa bang mdzod dang rin po che mang du bstsags pa thams cad khyod kyi phyir

byas par zad na ci'i phyir khyod zer ba ni mi nyan zhes smras so/ /de nas sbyin pa chen pos gnang ba'i lung thob nas/ yul mi thams cad la sbyin pa chen pos sbyin gtong chen po byed kyis/ thams cad 'dus shing shog shig ces bsgrags

so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dang bram ze dbul 'phongs pa mgon med pa dang / nad pa la sogs pa grong khyer gyi phyi rol na lam thog dag gang ngo / /de dag kyang dpag tshad brgya dang / nyi brgya dang / sum brgya dang / dpag tshad stong gi

khams nas 'ongs kha cig ni dpag tshad nyis stong sum stong bzhi stong lnga stong nas dpag tshad khri'i bar du lhags te/ de nas sprin bzhin du 'dus te thams cad la yid bzhin du sbyin pa ni gos 'dod pa la gos/ zas 'dod pa

la zas/ rin po che dang gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang / mu sa la gar ba dang / bzhon pa dang / theg pa dang / khyogs dang / skyed mos tshal dang / zhing dang / rkang 'gros la sogs te yid bzhin du sbyin pa byas so/ /de ltar

sbyin pa sbyin pa la zhugs te yun ring zhig lon pa dang bang mdzod sum cha zhig zad pa dang / bang mdzod bsrung mis bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sras kyis bang mdzod nas sbyin pa byas pas/ sum cha cig ni zad/

sum cha gnyis las ma lus na/ phan tshun du 'drul ba'i skyes dang tshong ci las bgyid pa dgongs shig ces smras so/ /kho bo ni bu la byams pas ngo mi bzlog gi bang mdzod stong kyang bla'o zhes smras so/ /de nas yang

ring shig lon pa dang / bang mdzod sum gnyis ni zad sum cha tsam lus pa dang mdzod bsrungs gyis yang bram ze la bang mdzod sum gnyis ni zad sum cha tsam las ma lus na/ phan tshun skyes bskur ba dang /

tshong zong ci la bya zhes smras so/ /bram ze des smras pa/ kho bo'i bu sdug ches pas ngo mi zlog ste smra mi phod do/ /khyod bdag gi ci legs su byos la zhing mi khom pa ltar tha snyad thogs shig /bang mdzod srungs kyis bram

ze las lung thob nas mdzod sgo bcad de/ don gnyer du song ngo / /de nas slong ba dag sbyin pa chen po'i thad du lhags nas/ bar 'ga' ni mdzod srung mi rnyed de mdzod sgo mi phyed/ gal te mdzod srung 'ong na yang yid bzhin du mi ster

bas sbyin pa chen po 'di snyam du bsamaso/ /'di ltar gyur pas 'di ni bang mdzod srung gis thugs mi thub pas pha mas man ngag 'ong gis yong yang bus pha ma'i bang mdzod stongs par bya ba mi rigs kyis/ bdag gi thabs ci zhig

byas na/ rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed de skye bo mang po la phan thogs par 'gyur bar bsams nas/ mi dag la 'di skad ces dris so/ /'jig rten na las ci byas na rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed de/ nor dbyig mang du rnyed cing zad mi shes

par 'gyur zhes dris pa dang / kha cig ni zhing mang po rmo na nor gyi dbyig mang por 'gyur zhes zer ro/ /kha cig ni rkang 'gros spel nas spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed do zhes zer ro/ /kha cig ni lam ring po nas tshong spogs byas na nor

mang du rnyed do zhes zer ro/ /kha cig ni rgya mtshor zhugs te nor bu rin po che blangs na rin po che mang du 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos de dag gis smras pa thos nas zhing rmo ba dang / rkang 'gros spel ba dang / lam ring

por tshong spogs la 'gro ba ni nga'i cha ma yin gyis/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'ba' zhig nga'i cha yin no zhes smras nas rgya mtshor 'jug snyam bsams te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni rgya mtsho nas rin po che mang po

blangs te/ dbul 'phongs pa la sbyin pa yid bzhin bya'o/ /bdag rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchir gnong shig ces smras so/ /de'i pha mas de skad smras pa thos nas 'khams te/ bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jig

rten na dbul 'phongs pa ni blo med de/ lus srog dang bsdos nas 'gro bar byed de khyod ci 'phongs na de ltar sems khyod sbyin pa byin 'dod na khyim na yod pa'i nor thams cad sbyin par byos shig /rgya mtshor 'gror mi rung ste/

rgya mtsho'i nang na chu rlabs dba' klong 'khyil ba dang / chu srin dang / klu gdug pa dang / srin mo dang / ri chu'i mdog can las sogs te/ shin tu ya nga ba'i gshed ma mang du yod pas thar bar dka' na/ khyod cis 'phongs na srog

dang bsdo bar byed/ 'di la ni nyan pa med kyis ma sems par 'dug cig ces bsgo'o/ /sbyin pa chen pos de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas bsams pa bzhin du ma grub pas yi dam bcas so/ /bsams pa 'di ma grub kyis bar

du pha ma'i mdun du sa la kha sbub du nyal te phyir mi ldang ngo snyam bsams te/ yab yum gyis mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag ni bsam pa bzhin du ma grub kyi bar du kha sbub du nyal ba 'di las mi ldang ngo zhes smras so/ /de nas

pha ma mi dga' ste/ gnyen bshes dang 'grogs nas rgya mtsho'i nang du gshed ma yang mang du yod pa'i gtam yang byas/ bdag kyang rmongs pa las lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du lha kun la mchod do/ /khyod lha zhig nga'i bur skyes na

nged ma bor bar zan zo shig /ces zhag cig zhag gnyis nas zhag drug gi bar du tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gros btab kyang ma nyan te/ sngar ci skad smras pa las ma zlog go/ /bdag gi bu 'di thog ma btsas nas de tsam gyi

bar du brtsams par bya ba mthar ma grub gyi bar du mi gtong bas rgya mtshor btang na brgyal phyir log kyang srid kyi ma btang na zhag bdun lon nas 'phral du bye brag phye ste/ da ni btang dgos so snyam nas bu'i drung du song ste/

lag pa nas bzung ste/ longs la zan zo shig yid bzhin du 'gro bar gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang / sbyin pa chen po yang langs ste bza' ba zos btung ba 'thungs so/ /de nas phyi rol tu byung te mi mang po la kho

bo rgya mtshor rin po che len du 'gro'o/ /khyod su 'gro dga' ba rnams kyang 'grogs ste 'dong gi ded dpon kyang kho bos byas/ yo byad kyang kho bos sbyar ro zhes bsgrags so/ /de'i tshe na mi lnga brgya tsam yang 'gro bar
khas blangs nas so so nas yo byad sbyar te/ nam 'gro ba'i dus kyang byas nas/ dus bzhin du lam du zhugs ste chas so/ /lam du 'jug pa'i tshe khye'u'i pha ma dang / rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang / blon

po la sogs te yul mi thams cad kyis kyang bskyal nas rdzongs btab po/ /pha ma yang ngus te phyi phyag byas nas zhag du ma'i lam 'das pa dang / 'brog sa stong du phyin te nub mo'i dgongs lam du mi rgod kyis bcom ste/

nor rdzas kun phrogs so/ de nas song song ba las grong khyer nga shu par zhes bya bar phyin nas grong khyer de na bram ze ka byi li zhes bya ba dang phrad do/ bram ze de'i khyim du song nas bram ze de la sbyin pa chen pos gser srang

stong slang bar byas so/ /de'i tshe na bram ze de la bu mo gser gyi mdog can skra mthon ting khar 'dug pa/ rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kyi rgyal bu thams cad kyis bslangs na yang ma ster ba cig yod do/ /de'i

tshe na sbyin pa chen po bram ze de'i sgor song ste/ bram ze ka byi li 'dug gam zhes dris pa'i tshe/ bu mos khyim gyi nang nas sbyin pa chen po'i skad thos pa tsam gyis/ phyi sgo na skad grag pa 'di kho mo'i khyim thabs

yin no zhes smras so/ /de nas bram ze sgor byung nas phrad pa dang / khye'u de la 'di ni nges par gzhan pas 'phags so snyam bsamaso/ /khye'u des gser bslangs pa dang / bram zes kyang sbyin par gnang nas

lag pa ya cig tu gser thogs lag pa ya cig tu ni bu mo khrid do/ bu mo 'di yang khyed kyi chung mar sbyin gyis long shig ces smras pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos smras pa/ bdag ni rgya mtsho chen por rin po che len

du 'gro ste/ rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs shin tu mang bas kho bo 'khor tam mi 'khor btol med de/ khyed kyi bu mo chung mar len pa'i thugs mi thub po/ /bram zes smras pa/ khyod bde bar 'khor na bu mo 'di chung

mar long shig ces smras pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos kyang 'khor na de bzhin bgyi'o zhes so/ /de nas bram zes kyang gser srang gsum stong dang gzhan yang yo byad ci dgos pa kun sbyar te/ de nas rgya mtsho'i

ngogs su phyin to/ /de nas gru bcos te gru'i nang du phyin nas de nas thag pa bdun gyis brtod de/ gru'i nang nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs 'di dag yod de/ 'di lta ste rlung nag po dang srin

po dang / chu rba rlabs 'khyil ba dang / klu gdug pa dang / chu'i mdog lta bu'i ri dang / chu srin la sogs pa'i bgegs kyang ya nga ba mang du yod kyis khyed 'gror mi dad pa zhig yod na 'di nas phyir log shig

phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re gal te lus dang srog la mi lta ste/ pha ma dang chung ma dang phu nu dang / gnyen bshes la ma chags na 'dong ngo / /gal te bde bar phyin na rin po che sna bdun gyis bu tsha rabs bdun tshun

cad phyug par 'gyur te/ longs spyod zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas thag pa gcig bcad do/ /de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du nyin re lan re de skad smras nas/ rtod thag re re bcad de rlung dang sbyar

te/ g.yor zhing bsgrengs bas mgyog khyad mda' bzhin song ngo / /de nas tshong pa dag rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/ sbyin pa chen pos mang du thos pas rin po che brtags pa la shin tu mkhas pas rin po che bzang

ngan dang / lci yang dang ci tsam ri ba'i rin thang tshun cad tshong pa rnams la bstan nas/ rin po che kha dog 'di lta bu ni yang mod kyis rin che'o/ /rin po che 'di lta bu ni lci yang rin chung gis ma len shig /

ha cang mang ches na yang gru lci bas 'bying ngo / /ha cang nyung ches na yang nyon mongs pa te song song ba'i don med pas 'di tsam ni ran no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshod kyang bstan nas rin po che grur brdzangs te ci la ma rag

nas da phyir 'dong ngo zhes chas pa dang / sbyin pa chen po gru'i nang du zhugs tu ma btub nas/ tshong pa rnams la kho bo ni klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ma thob kyi bar du phyir mi log go zhes

smras so/ /de nas tshong pa rnams ngus nas mya ngan gyis yi mug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag tshong pa rnams ni skyes bu ded dpon khyod kyi g.yog du 'dod te/ da khyod kyis 'dir bor te mi 'gro na bdag cag

kyang phyir khyim du mi phyin te/ thams cad khyam par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos smras pa/ tshong pa khyod ma nyes par kho bos yul du phyin pa'i smon lam btab bo zhes pog phor lag tu blangs te/ phyog bzhir
mchod nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni rin po che blangs te/ sems can 'phongs pa la phan gdags par ma zad kyis/ da ltar sbyin pa byed pa'i bsod nams de sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i phyir ro/ /bdag

gis smras pa 'di bden pa te smon lam bzhin du bgrang na tshong pa 'di dag rin po che dang bcas su nye zho med par 'dzam bu'i gling du bde bar phyin par shog shig /ces smon lam btab nas thag pa bcad de g.yor zhing bsgreng

nas phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du bde bar song ngo / /de dag song ba'i 'og tu sbyin pa chen po chur zhugs te song ba las zhag bdun gyi bar du pus mo tsam las ma nub bo/ /de nas yang zhag bdun gyi bar du brla drung tsam las ma nub bo/ /de nas yang zhag bdun song ba las rked

pa tsam las ma nub bo zhag bdun gyi bar du phrag pa tsam du phyin to/ /de nas zhag bdun gyi bar du ni rkyal lo/ /de nas ri shig gi drung du phyin pa dang / shing la 'jus te ri la 'dzegs nas/ zhag bdun gyis ri'i

rtse mor phyin to/ /ri'i rtse mor zhag bdun song song nas yang zhag bdun gyis shod du chu 'gram du phyin to/ /chu 'gram du phyin pa dang / chu'i nang nas pad ma gser gyi mdog can yod pa la sbrul gdug pas pad

ma'i rtsa ba la khril shing 'dug par mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug nas sems rtse gcig tu byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ sbrul gdug pa 'di dag kyang sngon

zhe sdang dang phrag dog byas pa'i rkyen gyis 'di lta bu lus mi sdug pa myong ngo snyam lhag par de la snying brtse ba bskyed pas sbrul gdug pa kun zhi nas/ byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i steng nas gom pa bor te song

song ba las zhag bdun gyis sbrul gdug pa de dag brtol to/ /de nas yang song song ba las srin po dang phrad nas srin po de dag mi'i dri tshor bas kun du tshol lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig tu

byams pa'i sems kyis brtag pas srin po de dag 'jam pa'i tshig gis skyes bu khyod gang nas 'ongs/ gang du 'gro zhes dris so/ de la sbyin pa chen pos kho bo ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che tshol du 'ongs pa yin

no zhes smras so/ /de nas srin po de dag rab tu dga' ste/ 'di ni bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa zhig go snyam bsam nas/ 'di ni da dung klu'i pho brang las shin tu ring ste/ nam yang mi phyin pas nyon mongs par 'gyur

gyis mthu zhig gis bstangs te bskyal lo/ /snyam nas nam mkhar khyer te dpag tshad bzhi brgya'i pha rol na phyin pas yang sa la bzhag go/ /sbyin pa chen po de nas song song ba las ring por ma lon par dngul gyi mkhar zhig
mthong nas klu'i gnas zhig yin snyam ste nye bar song ngo / /mkhar de'i phyi rol 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pa 'jigs su rung bas gang ngo / /sbyin pa chen pos

de dag mthong nas/ sbrul gdug pa 'di dag ni sngon zhe sdang che ba'i las kyis 'di lta bu'i lus 'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur to snyam ste/ de la bu cig pa dang 'dra ste/ byams shing snying rje'i sems kyis/ de

ltar byams pa'i sems bskyed pas sbrul gdug pa yang zhi bar gyur nas de dag brdzis nas klu'i mkhar du song ngo / /mkhar de la klu gnyis kyis bkris te/ klu'i mgo mkhar sgo la brten te/ klu de gnyis kyis
sbyin pa chen po de mthong nas mgo bteg te gdug pa 'byin pa las/ sbyin pa chen pos byams pa'i sems bskyed pas gdug pa yang zhi mgo smad pas sa la nyal lo/ /sbyin pa chen pos klu'i mgo la brdzis

nas mkhar gyi nang na song ba dang / mkhar gyi nang na klu zhig rin po che sna bdun gyi bzhal med khang na 'dug pa mthong ngo / /klu'i rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas/ dngangs te 'di snyam du sems so/ /

nga'i gnas 'di 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas klu dang gnod sbyin ma yin pa gzhan gang yang 'dir 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/ 'di lta bu su yin snyam ste 'dug pa las

langs nas bsu ste/ bsti bstang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas rin po che'i khri la bzhag ste/ kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs byin no/ /kha zas zos nas khyod 'dir ci la 'ongs ci ltar phyin dris so/ /byang chub
sems dpa'as smras pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ni dbul 'phongs pas nor dang / zas dang / gos kyi phyir gcig gis gcig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed do/ tshe 'phos ma thag

tu ngan song gsum du lhung ngo / /bdag ni 'di la snying brtse ste/ de dag gi mgon bya ba'i phyir lam ring po nas nyon mongs pa dang bsdos te/ rgyal po chen po khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/ /
yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i bsod nams kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal gyis/ bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar rin po che stsal du gsol/ /

klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni shin du rnyed par dka' ba yin te/ khyod don 'di'i phyir 'ong na/ 'dir zla ba gcig 'dug ste bdag gi mchod pa yang bzhes la bdag la chos bstan na/ yid

bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yang sbyin no zhes byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal pos nyin cig bzhin du kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te
phul nas/ rol mos byang chub sems dpa' mchod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'as kyang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i chos kyi yan lag zla ba cig gi bar du bstan nas/ phyir 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang / klu'i

rgyal po dga' nas spyi bo'i gtsug phud nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te phul lo/ /skyes bu chen po 'gro ba la phan pa'i don du brtan pa khyod gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o/ /nam mngon par sangs

rgyas pa na bdag kyang khyod kyi nye gnas mchog tu gyur cig ces smras so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po la nor bu rin po che 'di la mthu stobs ci yod dris na/ smras pa/ nor bu 'di ni dpag tshad nyis stong 'khor
ra 'khor yug tu dgos pa thams cad char bzhin du 'bebaso/ /byang chub sems dpas bsam pa/ nor bu rin po che 'di mthu stobs che mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gi bsam pa'i don chen po 'grub nus pa

ma yin no/ /snyam bsams nas klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bskyal te song ngo / /de nas yang song song ba dang / rgyang ma nas bai dUr+ya sngon po'i mkhar cig mthong ngo / /mkhar de'i drung du phyin
pa dang / mkhar de yang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas yongs su gang ngo / /byang chub sems dpas sbrul gdug pa de dag la snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/

sbrul gdug pa zhi nas sbrul de dag brdzis te song ngo / /mkhar sgor phyin pa dang / klu gnyis shig mkhar sgor nyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems kyis klu'i gdug pa zhi nas

mgo la brdzis nas mkhar gyi nang du song ngo / /de'i tshe na mkhar de na klu'i rgyal po gcig rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na 'dug pas/ rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gi
gnas 'di la 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang ba klu dang gnod sbyin min pa gzhan 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/ mi 'di lta bu su yin/ gang nas 'ongs snyam nas ya
mtshan du gyur te/ bsus nas bsti bstang dang bcas pas phyag byas te rin po che'i gdan la bzhag go/ /de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha
zas zos pa'i 'og tu khyod 'dir ci la 'ongs/ don ci yod ces dris so/ /byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ bdag ni klu'i rgyal po khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/ /klus smras
pa/ rin po che shin du rnyed par dka' ste/ khyod 'dod yang dag na kho bos gsol pa bzhin du zla ba gnyis 'dug ste/ bdag cag la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan nas/ bdag gi mchod pa bzhes

na rin po che yang sbyin no zhes byas pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal pos zla ba gnyis kyi bar du kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te/ phul

nas rol mo sna tshogs kyis mchod do/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag la rdzu phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i chos kyi rnam grangs zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bstan te/ phyir 'gro bar bsam nas klu'i rgyal pos yid

bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te phul nas/ skyes bu chen po yi dam la brtan pa khyod gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o/ /nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ bdag kyang khyod kyi nye gnas bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang / de

bzhin du gyur cig smras so/ /nor bu rin po che 'di la mthu stobs ci tsam yod ces dris pa na/ nor bu rin po che 'di ni dpag tshad bzhi stong 'khor ra 'khor yug tu ci 'dod pa thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs so/ /byang

chub sems dpa' yang 'di snyam du rin po che 'di'i mthu stobs che mod kyi bdag gi bsam pa grub nus pa ma yin no snyam nas/ klu'i rgyal po'i mkhar gyi sgo'i phyi rol tu byang chub sems dpa' bskyal lo/ /de nas

yang song song ba las/ rgyang ma nas gser gyi mkhar rab tu 'tsher ba zhig mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i drung du song ste phyin pa dang / mkhar de yang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi
nang na sbrul gdug pas yongs su gang ba mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' yang byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sbrul gdug pa zhi nas de la brdzis te song ngo / /mkhar de la yang klu gnyis shig 'khyil te

mgo sgo'i phyi rol du bstan te nyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas mgo bteg te gdug pa phyung ba las byang chub sems dpas snying rje zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed pas gdug pa zhi nas de'i mgo brdzis
te mkhar gyi nang du song ste/ mkhar de'i nang na klu'i rgyal pos rin po che'i gzhal med khang nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ma nas mthong nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gi gnas 'di ni 'obs rim pa bdun

gyis bskor te 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas klu dang gnod sbyin ma gtogs par gzhan gang yang 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/ mi 'di su yin gang nas 'ongs snyam nas ngo mtshar du bzung ste/ rgyang
ma nas bsus te sti bstang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/ rin po che'i gdan la 'dug du bcug go/ /de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te/ phul nas kha zas zos pa'i 'og
tu khyod su zhig gang nas 'ongs shes dris so/ /de la byang chub sems dpas bdag ni 'dzam bu'i gling nas mchis te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bsod nams chung bas nor dang zas skom gyi phyir gcig
la cig rnam pa sna tshogs pas 'tshe zhing gsod do/ /mi dge ba bcu'i las rdzogs par byas pas tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du lhung ste/ sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur bas/ bdag de dag la

snying brtse ste mgon bya ba'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/ /klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rnyed sla ba ma yin te/ skyes bu khyod bdag
la re ste 'ongs na bdag gi gnas 'dir zla ba bzhi 'dug ste/ bdag gi mchod pa bzhes na rin po che yang 'bul lo/ /zhes byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'as yang de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes smras nas/

klu'i rgyal pos zla ba bzhi'i bar du kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas/ rol mos kyang mchod do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'as chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher phye zhing bstan pas
klu'i rgyal pos dga' nas klu gzhan dang gnod sbyin gzhan la mi ltos par yo byad thams cad kyang yid bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de lta bu'i tshul du zla ba bzhi byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro bar chas

pa dang / klu'i rgyal pos gtsug gi phud bu nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas/ skyes bu chen po yi dam la brtan pa khyod gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o/ /nam
mngon par sangs rgyas pa na bdag kyang nye gnas mchog tu gyur te/ bsnyen bkur bar shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa'as kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/ /nor bu rin

po che 'di la mthu stobs ci tsam zhig yod ces dris so/ /klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/ nor bu rin po che 'di dpag tshad brgyad stong 'khor ra 'khor yug tu rin po che char bzhin du 'bebs te/ ci 'dod pa thams
cad 'bebs so zhes smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gdod dga' nas/ 'di snyam du 'dzam bu'i gling gi khyon ni dpag tshad bdun stong las med de/ nor bu rin po che 'dis ni bdag gi re ba bskong ngo

snyam bsam nas/ snga phyir rnyed pa'i nor bu rin po che gsum char gos kyi mthar phyung ste mkhar gyi sgor phyin pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bskyal nas so sor dong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'
pha zad zhig du phyin nas/ nor bu rin po che rnams lag par thogs te/ 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/ /nor bu 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag na/ bdag mkha' la phur bar gyur ces

smras so/ /de skad ces smras ma thag du nam mkha' la 'phur te/ rgya mtsho'i bgegs las thar nas/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin par gyur te/ de na cung zad bsti zhing ngal bsos pa'i lam du gnyid log pa dang
de'i tshe na rgya mtsho'i klu phran rnams 'di skad ces bsgros so/ /rgya mtsho 'di na rin po che 'di gsum las med de gsum char mi 'dis khyer te nor bu 'di ni yon tan dang ldan na bdag cag la yang dgos

kyi phyir rku'o zhes bgros nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis log pa'i tshe yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che klu rnams kyis phyir brkus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sad nas bltas na nor bu rin po che med pas 'di

snyam du bsams so/ /'di ni gdon mi za bar rgya mtsho'i klus brkus kyis/ bdag gis mthu ci yod pas rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te bskam par bya'o snyam te/ nor bu phyir ma thob kyi bar du lag pa stong par phyir mi 'gro

snyam yi dam bcas so/ /rgya mtsho'i ngogs su song ste ru sbal gyi khog pa zhig blang nas lag pa gnyis kyis rgya mtsho bcus so/ /de'i tshe na rgya mtsho'i lhas de'i bsam pa shes nas/ /de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
dpag tshad stong phrag sum brgya sum bcu yod pas gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad log kyang rgya mtsho bskam par mi nus na/ khyod cig pus nus pa lta ci smos te/ don med do/ /byang chub sems

dpas smras pa/ mi gcig gis snying nas las byas na ci yang mi 'grub pa med do/ /bdag gi rin po che de rnyed pas 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya snyam ste/ de'i bsod nams kyis mngon par 'tshang
rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la sems ma zhum na ci'i phyir rgya mtsho 'di bskam par mi nus zhes smras so/ /de'i tshe na lha khyab 'jug la sogs pas rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' gcig pus lus yid mthun

par rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te/ 'gro ba mang po'i don du dka' ba byed par mthong nas/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' btang ngo snyam bsam te/ gcig nas cig tu sbran nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i gan du

lhags te/ byang chub sems dpa' snod kyis chu bcu ba mthong nas/ lha de dag thams cad so so'i lha'i gos phud nas chur smyugs te/ phyir phyung bas rgya mtsho'i chu dpag tshad bzhi bcu 'grib bo/ /yang lan
gcig smyugs pas dpag tshad brgyad bcu 'grib bo/ /lan gsum smyugs pas dpag tshad brgya nyi shu 'grib pas/ klu de dag 'jigs skrag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du lhags te/ 'di skad du thong zhig

rgya mtsho'i chu skams par ma byed ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpas btang ngo / /de nas klu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la khyod kyi nor bu rin po che 'di ci zhig du dgos/ smras pa/ bdag gis
sems can la phan pa'i don du dgos so/ /klus smras pa/ sems can la phan pa'i don du dgos na/ rgya mtsho'i nang na yang sems can mang du yod na ci'i phyir bskur zhes smras so/ /smras pa rgya mtsho'i
nang na gnas pa yang / sems can yin mod kyi/ de la 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal med do/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dag ni nor gyi phyir cig gis gcig rnam par 'tshe zhing gnod par byed de/ mi dge

ba bcu rdzogs par byed pas tshe 'phos nas kun sems can dmyal bar skye ste/ bdag ni de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir rin po che 'di dgos so zhes smras pa dang / klu rnams kyis nor bu rin po che phyung ste slar phul

lo/ /rgya mtsho'i lhas byang chub sems dpa' de ltar brtson 'grus brtan pa mthong nas/ 'di gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o snyam bsams te/ nam mngon par sangs rgyas na bdag kyang nye gnas kyi mchog du gyur
cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rin po che phyir thob nas steng gi nam mkha' la phur te/ gnas su 'ong nas sngar tshong pa grogs po rnams dong ba yod dam/ bde bar phyin tam
zhes dris so/ /tshong pa grogs po dag kyang bde bar phyin nas/ de dag gcig dga' nas/ grogs po rnams kyis ngo mtshar ya mtshan du bzung ngo / /de nas bram ze ka byi li'i sgor phyin nas/
byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho las phyir log go zhes thos nas/ thams cad kyis sgor bsus te dga' nas/ tshong pa grogs po rnams dang bcas su dga' ston chen po bgyis so/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems

dpa' rin po che thogs nas khyim du 'ongs pa dang / bram ze de'i bang mdzod thams cad yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /de nas bram ze ka byi lis rin po che sna tshogs kyis bu mo brgyan nas rin po che'i chu snod bskur te/
byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang rkang pa bkrus nas/ bu mo lag nas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' la gtad do/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang bzhes nas/ bram ze rab tu dga' ste/ bu mo'i g.yog bu mo lnga

brgya dang / glang po che lnga brgya yang rin po ches brgyan te/ rol mo byas nas byang chub sems dpa' la brdzangs so/ /de'i tshe na sbyin pa chen po'i pha ma bu dang bral ba'i 'og tu rtag tu ngus pas pha ma gnyis mig mdongs

par gyur te/ rgya mtsho nas log nas pha ma dang phrad pas/ bus phyag 'tshal te/ de la lag pa nas 'jus nas bu yin par rtogs so/ /sbyin pa chen po khyod kyis nged bor nas song ba'i 'og tu mig kyang mdongs so/ /

khyod rgya mtshor song song na ci rnyed ces dris pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos nor bu rin po che pha'i lag du byin te/ bdag gis 'di rnyed do zhes smras nas/ pha mas lag tu blangs te bsnams nas/ 'di lta bu'i rdo ba ni nga'i

mdzod na sngar yang mang du yod na/ 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang bsdo ci dgos zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas nor bu phyir blangs te/ pha ma'i mig phyis pa tsam gyis 'di ltar rlung drag pos sprin
bus pa bzhin du pha ma gnyi ga'i mig kyang sngar bas gsal bar mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas pha ma gnyis ka dga' ste/ de ni nor bu rin po che yin yang dag par lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i don sel bar gyur

to zhes smras so/ /de nas sbyin pa chen pos rin po che thogs te/ khyod yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag na/ kho bo'i pha ma'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gdan 'byung zhing / rin po che'i bla bres steng

khebs par shog shig ces smon lam btab ma thag tu de bzhin grub nas/ rgyal po'i bang mdzod thams cad kyang gang bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal pos pho nya gcig glang po che dpag tshad brgya stong du 'gro ba zhig

bskyon te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la sbyin pa chen pos rgya mtsho nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed de/ nor bu yon tan can des de ste zhag bdun na nor bu rin po che la sogs te gos dang zas dang
dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs kyis so so nas ci bde bar long shig ces bsgrags so/ /de ltar kun tu bsgrags nas/ sbyin pa chen pos khrus byas te/ gos gsar pa bgos nas/
ga la'i thang du mnyam por rgyal mtshan btsugs te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas pog phor lag tu blangs te 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/ /'dzam bu'i

gling gi mi dag ni dbul 'phongs pa sha stag ste/ de dag la phan gdags dgos kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu yin te/ mi brdzun na so so nas ci dang ci dgos pa tha dad pa de dag thams cad yid bzhin du char ltar phob shig /
ces smras ma thag tu phyogs bzhi nas rlung nag po g.yos nas/ de ma thag tu mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyil thams cad phyags te/ char zim bu mi drag pa zhig bab nas/ rdul mi 'thul bar byas pa'i 'og du thog
mar bza' ba dang / btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du babs so/ /de nas 'bru rnams char bzhin du babs so/ /de nas gos char bzhin du bab bo/ /de nas rin po che
char bzhin du bab ste/ /'dzam bu'i gling na nor bu rin po che'i phung pos yongs su gang nas/ rin po che dag gseg ma dang gyo mo lta bur byas so/ /byang chub sems dpas de ltar kun chog par byas nas/

'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dag ni gos dang / zas dang nor gyi phyir gcig gis gcig gsod cing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtse bas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'ba'

zhig byed de/ tshe'i dus byas nas ngan song gsum du lhung ste/ mun pa nas mun par 'gro ste/ bdag ni de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir rgya mtsho'i bgegs dang / nyon mongs pa mang po khyad du bsad de/ khyod rnams

bde bar bya ba'i phyir rgya mtsho nas rin po che dag blangs nas/ da khyod cis kyang mi brel te bde bar gyur gyis/ khyed rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la lus dang ngag dang yid bsdus te/ brtson par gyis shig
ces thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas bstan cing bskul lo/ /de ltar bstan cing bskul nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byed du bcug pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag tshe 'phos nas/ mtho

ris kyi lhar skyes so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na de'i pha bram ze n+ya gro ta ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no/ /de'i mar gyur pa de ni nga'i yum lha mdzes yin no/ /sbyin pa chen po ni nga yin no/ /dngul gyi

mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni shA ri'i bu yin no/ /bai dur+ya'i mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni maud gal gyi bu yin no/ /gser gyi mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni kun dga' bo yin no/ /rgya mtsho'i lha ni ma 'gags pa yin no/ /
kun dga' bo 'di rgyal po byed pa na yang nga la bsnyen bkur byas te/ dus la mkhas pa da ltar gyi bar du yang dus la mkhas kyis/ 'dod pa gsum yang yid bzhin du gnang ngo / /zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
kun dga' bo dga' mgu rangs nas/ pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bdag gis nam 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o zhes gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor mang po rnams la la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa nas/ dgra bcom pa'i bar du thob bo/ /la la ni rang sangs rgyas su gyur to/ /la la ni bla na med pa'i byang
chub tu sems bskyed do/ /la la ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob nas/ rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/ /sbyin pa chen po rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i le'u ste/ sum bcu pa'o// // 'di
skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab n+ya gro ta'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pas bskor cing bzhugs pa
las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan dang dpe byad dang gser gyi mdog lta bu'i sku la 'khor mang po thams cad ngo mtshar du 'dzin te/ bstod cing bsngags so/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor kun las
'phags te/ thams cad kyi mchog gtso bor gyur pas/ dge slong dag the tsom du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig tu
'khor kun las 'phags te/ mchog gtsor gyur pa ma yin no/ /sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dag kun las 'phags te gtso bor gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag sngon ci ltar gtso bor gyur pa bstan par
gsol pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ces bka' stsal to/ /sngon 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir

rgyal po chen po rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa zhig byung ste/ de la bu ni lnga brgya yod do/ /dus phyi zhig na btsun mo chen mo la bu zhig btsas te/ gser gyi mdog can skra mthon ting lta bu

lag mthil na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan yod pa/ rkang pa g.yon gyi mthil na rta'i ri mo yod pa/ rkang pa g.yas kyi mthil na glang po che'i ri mo yod pa/ bsod nams dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/ ming
yang me long gdong zhes ming btags so/ /rgyal po chen po nad kyis btab ste tshe'i dus nye ba na/ blon po rnams kyis sras 'di rnams kyi nang na/ rgyal tshab du gang gzhug /rgyal po'i dbang gang la

bskur zhes dris pa dang / rgyal po nga'i yon tan dang mtshan rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na/ rgyal por chug la dbang skur cig ces bsgo'o/ /bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus kyi mdog gser lta bu la skra mthon ting

du 'dug pa dang / lag pa gnyis kyi mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthil na glang po che'i ri mo yod pa dang / rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthil na rta'i ri mo yod pa dang / rgyal po'i gos

gon na lus dang mtsham zhing mi che ba dang mi chung ba dang / rgyal po'i stan las 'dug na gzi brjid dang mthu dang ldan pa dang / rgyal phran rnams kyi rim gro bsnyen bkur cher byed de/ btsun mo dang pho brang slas rnam kyang de

la dga' zhing phyag byed pa dang / lha rnams kyi rten du khrid na lha rnams kyis phyag byed pa dang / yon tan dang bsod nams kyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs shing / thams cad kyi yid tshim par byed
pa dang / btsun mo chen mo la btsas pa ste/ yon tan 'di dag dang ldan na rgyal po'i dbang bskur cig ces bsgo nas/ mi rtag pa mngon gsum du gyur te tshe 'phos so/ /de nas rgyal bu dang blon po rnams
'dus te/ rgyal bu nang gi che ba las mthar gyi yon tan bcu gang la yod pa brtags na/ rgyal bu gzhan thams cad ni lus gser lta bu'i mdog can ma yin/ skra mthon ting du 'dug pa ma yin/ lag pa'i

mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa ma yin/ rkang pa'i mthil na glang po che dang rta'i ri mo yod pa ma yin/ rgyal po'i gos dang mtsham pa ma yin/ rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag na dngangs pa ltar 'greng bar gyur/ rgyal

phran dang / blon po rnams bsti bstang dang phyag mi byed de/ btsun mo dang pho brang slas rnams dga' ba dang / phyag bya ba ma yin/ lha rten du khrid na lha rnams kyis phyag bya ba ma yin/ rin po che'i char 'bebs

pa nus pa ma yin/ btsun mo chen mo'i sras kyang ma yin te/ rgyal bu lnga brgya las mtshan gcig dang ldan pa 'ga' yang ma byung ste/ srangs nang gi tha chung 'ba' shig lus gser gyi mdog can la/ skra mthon ting gi

kha dog lta bu la/ lag pa gnyis 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ni ldan/ rkang pa gnyis kyi mthil na glang po dang / rta'i ri mo yang yod/ gos dang lus su 'tsham/ rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag na gzi brjid dang byin che/

rgyal phran thams cad kyis bsti bstang dang bcas pas phyag byed cing btsun mo dang pho brang slas kyang dga' bas phyag byed do/ /lha'i rten du 'ongs nas lha rnams phyag byed/ rin po che phobs shig ces smras ma thag tu char

bzhin du 'babs/ btsun mo yang nang gi/ chen mo la btsas te/ mtshan rdzogs par ldan pas rgyal phran dang blon po rnams kyis rgyal por dbang bskur te/ tshes bco lnga'i nyin par nyi ma thog mar shar ba na/

gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa che khyad dpag tshad gcig pa shar phyogs nas 'ongs te/ de la pus mo gtsugs nas gal te bdag yon tan dang ldan te rgyal por 'gyur na/ 'khor lo 'di bdag gi drung du

nye bar shog shig ces smras pa dang / nam mkha'i phyogs nas nye bar 'ongs so/ /glang po rin po che ni ri spos kyi ngad can las 'ongs te/ mjug ma la nor bus brgyan pa/ rgyal po de la zhon nas nam mkha' las

'phur te/ nyi ma phyed kyis gling bzhi las 'khor ro/ /gal te rkang pas 'gro na rkang pa'i rjes gang rigs par gser gyi bye mar gyur to/ /rta rin po che ni kha dog 'thon ka la rnga rngog dmar ba rin po che sna bdun 'bab pa/

rgyal po de la zhon na zan cig bza' rin tsam gyis gling bzhi nas 'khor te/ mi ngal mi dub bo/ /nor bu rin po che ni 'od zer nyin mtshan du gsal te/ rgyang grags brgya nyi shu tshun cad 'od kyis snang bar byed la/ rin

po sna bdun char bzhin du 'bebs shing thams cad la sbyin par byed do/ /bud med rin po che ni bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ rgyal po'i yid tshim par byed do/ /khyim bdag rin po che ni rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun ci dgos pa yid bzhin du sbyar

te/ zad mi shes par byed do/ /blon po rin po che ni rgyal pos dpung rnam bzhi bgos na/ bltas pa tsam gyis dpung gi tshogs 'dus te rtsal dang mthur ldan no/ /de ltar rin po che sna bdun dang ldan nas de 'di snyam bsams so/ /

thabs 'di lta bu thob pa yang sngon gyi bsod nams las skyes kyis rgyal po'i gdung rgyud mi chad par bya'o snyam bsams nas/ spos chus khrus byas te gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas lag na pog phor thogs ste/
shar phyogs logs su pus mo sa la btsugs nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /shar phyogs na skyes bu 'phags pa bzhugs pa rnams bdag gsol ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol zhes smras pa dang / shar phyogs

nas rang sangs rgyas nyi khri snyed rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs so/ /lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin du gsol pa dang / de dag kyang so so nas rang sangs rgyas nyi khri snyed rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs so/ /de nas

rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis yo byad rnam bzhi sbyar te mchod pa byas so/ /de nas rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed phyir yul du 'gro bar gsol te/ mchi phyag 'tshal ba na rgyal phran rnams kyis 'phags pa rnams

la shes kyi/ bdag cag kyang mchod pa 'tshal te bsod nams bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rang sangs rgyas bzhi khri la yid bzhin du mchod nas/

tshe'i dus byas pa dang / mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so/ /dge slong dag de'i tshe na rgyal po me long gdong de ni da ltar nga yin no/ /rgyal po de'i pha de ni nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no/ /btsun mo de ni nga'i yum lha mdzes yin

no/ /rgyal bu lnga brgya de ni shAg rigs lnga brgya yin no/ /de'i dus na yang thams cad kyi gtso bo mchog tu gyur te/ da sangs rgyas nas kyang mtshan dang ldan pa'i mchog gtso bor gyur to/ /'khor mang po rnams
sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yid rangs nas mngon par dga'o/ /rgyal po me long gdong gi le'u ste/ sum bcu gcig pa'o// // bam po dgu pa/ 'di skad bdag gis thos

pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /lha sbyin rab tu byung mod kyis rnyed pa la chags pas mtshams med pa'i las kyis

ri brnyil nas sangs rgyas mnan pa dang / zhabs la shing gi tshal ba 'dzugs pa dang / glang po che smyon pa btang ba dang / mthun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang / zag pa zad pa'i dge slong ma bsad pa dang /
mi dge ba'i las 'di dag byas nas/ skye ba phyi ma la rnam par smin pas 'jigs te/ mu stegs pa'i ston pa drug gi thad du song nas dris so/ /ston pa drug gis kyang ngan par blta ba'i chos rtog pa

byas kyang sdig par mi 'gyur dge ba byas kyang bsod nams su mi 'gyur ba'i chos bstan nas/ de la yid ches te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad do/ /de'i tshe na kun dga' bos phu nu bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rab tu mi dga' ste/

ngus nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha sbyin gti mug can ni mi dge ba'i las kha na ma tho ba bgyis te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad nas shAg gi rigs rnams kyang sun 'byin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la

bka' stsal pa/ lha sbyin 'di ni tshe 'di 'ba' shig la rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad par ma zad kyi/ 'das pa'i dus na yang rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir lus dang srog kyang stong pa'i las byas so/ /

de la dge slong dag the tsom du gyur nas/ kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha sbyin 'das pa'i dus na yang rnyed pa dang grags pa'i slad du lus dang srog stong pa'i las bgyis pa ci lta bu lags shes

gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul bA ra na se na

bram ze ha yi zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te ring por ma lon par chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ zla ba dgu tshang ba na khye'u zhig btsas te/ de nas btsas ston chen po byas nas/

bu'i ming yang legs tshol zhes bya bar btags te/ ma ma la gtad nas gsos so/ /de nas yang sems can dang ldan par gyur te mnyen zhing des las sems can dang ldan pa'i 'og tu gtum zhing 'khro bar gyur to/ /
de nas zla ba dgu tshang ba dang khye'u zhig btsas te/ de ltar ma yang sngon las gyur pas/ bu'i ming yang nyes tshol zhes bya bar btags te/ ma ma la gtad nas gsos so/ /khye'u spun gnyis phyir

cher skyes nas/ spun gnyis rgya mtshor rin po che len par dong ngo / /so so nas 'khor dang grogs lnga brgya lnga brgya rnyed nas lam du zhugs so/ /lam ring bas zhag bdun gyi gnas su ma phyin par rgyags chad de/ srog dang

bral du nye nas/ legs tshol dang tshong pa grogs po rnams nyam thag ste/ lha thams cad mchod par byed do/ /de nas 'brog stong pa de nas skyed shing bzang po zhig mthong nas/ thams cad skyed shing gi drung

du lhags pa dang / shing gi drung na chu mig bzang po zhig kyang yod do/ tshong pa rnams chu mig de la 'thung nas/ bdag cag gis lha mchod pa'i rtags 'di yin no zhes smras pa dang / lhas mngon sum du smras te/ skyed

shing gi yal ga chog shig dang 'dod pa thams cad 'byung ngo zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas yal ga gcig bcad pa dang / btung ba zhim por byung ngo / /de nas yal ga gcig bcad pa dang / kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa thams cad

byung nas/ de dag kun gyis tshim par zos so/ /de nas yang yal ga gcig bcad pa dang / gos rnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo / /de nas yang gcig bcad pa dang nor bu rin po che sna tshogs byung ste/ khal thams cad longs so/ /

de nas nyes tshol la sogs pa thams cad kyang der lhags ste/ snga ma'i yal ga bcad pa las rin po che sna tshogs khal longs pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du bsams so/ /snga ma 'di dag gis yal ga las kyang rin po che chog pa

rnyed na/ shing 'di'i rtsa ba phyung ba ni nor bu rin po che sna tshogs mang du rnyed do snyam bsams nas/ shing gi rtsa ba brko bar gzaso/ /de nas legs tshol mi dga' ste smras pa/ bdag cag ni 'phong ste srog dang bral ba

las shing 'dis bdag cag srog gsos kyis khyod shing 'di ma gcod ces smras na/ nyes tshol ma nyan te shing rtsa ba bcad do/ /de nas legs tshol kyang mthong mi 'dod par khal dang bcas pa song ba'i 'og tu shing

gi rtsa ba nas srin po lnga brgya byung ste/ nyes tshol dang tshong pa kun zos so/ /kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na legs tshol de ni da ltar nga yin no/ /de'i pha de ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no/ /de'i ma de ni nga'i yum lha

mdzes ma yin no/ /nyes tshol de ni da ltar lha sbyin yin no/ /kun dga' bo lha sbyin gyis da ltar 'ba' shig nga la gnod pa byed par ma zad kyis rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir skye ba thams cad du nga la gnod pa byas na/ ngas

phan pa'i chos bstan te phan par byas kyang / lha sbyin nga la dgrar 'dzin to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/ 'khor mang po rnams rjes su yid rang nas mngon par dga'o/ /legs tshol dang nyes tshol

gnyis kyi le'u ste sum bcu gnyis pa'o// // 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i

tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lha sbyin gyis thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gnod par bsam kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas ni lhas sbyin dang sgra gcan zin gnyis la mi 'dra bar med par dgongs te/

rtag tu de la thugs brtse bar mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ lha sbyin 'dis dus 'di nyid na nga la gnod pa byas par ma zad de/ skye ba gzhan

du yang nga la gnod sems bskyed do/ /dge slong dag the tsom du gyur nas kun du dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha sbyin 'dis skye ba gzhan dag na bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ci ltar bgyis shes
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol tu/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po

rin po che go cha zhes bya ba rgyal phran lnga brgya la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo / /de la btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas lnga brgya snyed yod kyang bu med de/ nyi zla'i lha la sogs te lha thams cad la gsol ba byas te/ lo du ma

lon kyang bu med pas mi dga' bar gyur te/ 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag la bu ni cig kyang med de/ de'u re tshe zad pas rgyal phran lnga brgya yang gcig la gcig mi nyan te/ thams cad 'khrugs nas/ yul mi bde

bar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud de/ lag pa 'gram pa la brten nas 'dug pa las/ de'i tshe na lha zhig rgyal po'i bsam pa shes nas/ rmi lam du rgyal po la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /pho brang gi phyi rol
tshal gyi nang na/ drang srong gnyis shig yod de gcig gi lus gser gyi mdog du 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la gsol ba thob shig dang / bur skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bsgo ma thag tu gnyid log pa las

sad nas/ drang srong gnyis gang na 'dug pa tshol du song ste/ drang srong de dang phrad nas/ bdag la rgyal po'i rigs 'tshob pa med kyis khyod bdag gi rigs su skyes te/ rigs gso shig ces gsol ba btab nas/

drang srong des kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so/ /drang srong gcig gis kyang bdag khyod kyi rigs su skye bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang / rgyal po rab tu dga' nas/ khyod kyang bdag gi rigs su skye bar shog shig /
ces smras so/ /de nas rgyal po phyir log nas dus phyi zhig na drang srong gser gyi mdog can tshe'i dus byas nas/ btsun mo chen mo'i mngal du skyes so/ /bud med mkhas pas bu yod par shes nas bu phor
shes te bdag la nges par bu pho yod do zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos kyang btsun mo'i rim gro bskyed do/ /zla ba dgu tshang nas bu khye'u gser gyi mdog can/ skra mthon ting khar 'dug pa/ mtshan dang

ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /rgyal po rab tu dga' nas/ btsas ston byas te/ mtshan mkhan gyis mtshan btags nas/ bu'i ming yang dge don du btags so/ /de nas btsun mo cig kyang sems can dang ldan par gyur te/

drang srong gcig shos kyang tshe'i dus byas nas btsun mo'i mngal du skyes so/ /de nas yang btsas ston byas te/ mtshan mkhan gyis mtshan bltas nas/ khye'u'i ming sdig don du btags so/ /rgyal po bu la byams

shing sdug pas bu 'dug pa'i gnas dbyar rgun ston dpyid so sor byas so/ /khye'u cher skyes nas rig pa bcwo brgyad la sogs te/ gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par gyur to/ /phyis dge don gyi rgyal po la gsol to/ /

bdag phyi rol du 'chag cing ltar 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang / de'i pha mas kyang bu 'chag du 'gro'o zhes lam sang phyag dar byed du bcug ste/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgrengs nas me tog gis gtor to/ /bdug pa dang spos kyis bdug

pa la sogs pas yo lang bsham nas/ dge don glang po rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa la bskyon te/ dril bsgrags rdza rnga brdungs rol mo dang sil snyan dkrol te/ skya pa brgya stong snyed kyis bskor te/ grong khyer gyi phyi

rol du song ngo / /yul mi thams cad lam gyi g.yas g.yon na khang bu brtsegs pa'i steng na mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing / 'di byin dang gzi brjid ni tshangs pa dang 'dra'o zhes bsgrags so/ /de nas song song ba las mu to ba dag

cig gis gos hrus po gyon nas snod chag pa thogs te/ cung zad slang ngo zhes 'bod pa dge don gyis thos nas/ de dag la khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar nyon mongs shing sdug ces dris so/ /de dag las kha cig ni 'di skad du bdag

la pha ma dang phu nu dang bu smad dang / gnyen bshes ma mchis pas sdug go zhes zer ro/ /de la kha cig ni bdag cag yun ring du nad kyis tag pas mi sos te/ sdug go zhes zer ro/ /de la kha cig ni bdag cag bag ma

byas pas chom pos bcom ste ci yang mi bdog pas slongs mo byed do zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ mchi ma glags te so dong / /pha zad cig tsam nas shan pa dag cig srog chags bsad nas

pags pa bshu ba dang / dmyal gtub pa dag mthong nas/ dge don gyis e ma ho 'di dag ci byed ces dris pa na/ bdag cag gi pha mes rgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba'i gsad pa'i las byed de/ 'di ma byas na mi 'tsho'o/ /

zhes zer ro/ /de la dge don ngo tsha bar gyur te blta mi phod par song ngo / /de nas yang pha zad phyin pa dang zhing pa dag cig zhing rmos pa'i 'og tu srin bu mang du byung ba las/ bya mang po dag sbrul gdug pa dag thu zhing za ba mthong

ba dang / 'di dag ci byed ces dris pa na bdag cag ni zhing rmos te sa glogs pa'i shul du sa bon btab nas/ phyis mang du skyes te des 'tsho zhing rgyal po'i dpya yang dbul zhes zer ro/ /dge don de la yang ngo tsha bar gyur nas pha

zad song ba dang / rngon pa bya rgya bres pa dang / snyi btsugs nas bya rnams bshor ba dang / sems can dag bya rgya dang snyi la zin nas lus rdeg cing theg kyang ma shor te/ snying rje'i skad phyung ste/ shin tu 'jigs skrag pa

dag mthong nas/ khyod 'di ci byed ces dris na bdag cag kyang rgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba gsod pa'i las byed pas 'tsho zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas shin du yi mug ste/ yang pha zad song ba dang /

nya pa dag rgya btsugs nas mang du zin te/ thang du phung por spungs nas da dung yang 'gul ba dag mthong nas/ 'di dag ci byed dris na/ bdag cag kyang rgyud kyi las gzhan mi byed kyis 'di ltar nya bshor zhing 'tsho bar byed do/ /
zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis de lta bu dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/ /sems can 'di dag ni dbul 'phongs pas bgo ba dang / bza' ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba'i las

gsod pa sogs byed de/ 'di dag ni tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du lhung ste/ mun pa nas mun par 'gro zhing / thar pa'i dus med do snyam du bsams nas phyir khyim du 'ongs te/ nyin mtshan du sems shing ni

mi dga' nas/ pha'i drung du song ste pha la bdag la gsol ba zhig mchis kyis/ gnong shig ces smras so/ /phas kyang bu khyod ci zer khyod ci smras pa bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so/ /yab bdag gis sngon phyi rol tu

mchis pa las mi mang pos gos dang / zas kyi phyir thams cad nyon mongs te/ gcig gis gcig la gsod pa dang / brdzun pa dang / mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pa mthong nas/ de dag la sbyin par gyid

par bsam kyis/ yab kyis bang mdzod chen po las brel 'phongs pa dag gi phyir yid bzhin du spyod du gnong shig /phas smras pa/ ngas rin po che dang bang mdzod mang du bstsags pa thams cad khyod kyi phyir byas par

zad na/ ci'i phyir khyod zer bzhin du mi nyan ces smras so/ /de nas dge don gyis phas gnang ba'i lung thob nas/ yul mi thams cad la dge don ni sbyin pa chen po byed kyis/ thams cad 'dus shing shog shig

ces smras so/ /de'i tshe na dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / dbul 'phongs pa mgon med pa dang / na ba la sogs te/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol na lam thog thag gang ngo / /de dag kyang dpag tshad brgya dang / sum brgya

dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / dpag tshad stong gi lam nas 'ongs/ kha cig ni dpag tshad nyis stong / sum stong / bzhi stong / lnga stong / dpag tshad khri'i lam nas lhags te/ sprin bzhin du 'dus nas

thams cad las yid bzhin du sbyin pa ni gos 'dod pa la gos/ zas 'dod pa la zas/ rin po che dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai dur+ya dang / mu sa la gar ba dang / bzhon pa dang / theg pa dang / khyogs dang /
skyed mos tshal dang / zhing dang / rkang 'gros la sogs ste/ yid bzhin du/ sbyin pa byas so/ /de ltar sbyin pa la zhugs te/ yun ring zhig lon pa dang / bang mdzod sum cha ni zad nas/ mdzod bsrungs

kyis rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sras kyis bang mdzod las sbyin pa bgyis nas sum cha ni zad pas/ sum gnyis tsam las ma lus na/ phan tshun 'drul ba'i skyes dang / tshong zong ci las bgyid dgongs

shig ces smras so/ /nga ni sras 'di la byams pas ngo mi zlog gi bang mdzod stong yang sla'o zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas yang ring zhig lon pa dang / bang mdzod sum nyis ni zad/ sum cha tsam lus pa dang / mdzod

bsrung kyis yang rgyal po la ni bang mdzod sum nyis tsam ni zad/ /sum cha tsam las ma lus na/ phan tshun skyes bskur ba dang / tshong zong ci las bgyi zhes smras so/ /rgyal pos de la bsgo ba/ nga'i sras sdug ches

pas ngo mi bzlog la smra ba mi phod kyis/ khyod bdag gis thabs ci legs su byas la brel cing mi khom pa ltar tha snyad thogs shing / mdzod bsrungs kyis rgyal po las lung thob nas mdzod sgo bcad de/ don gnyer du song

ngo / /de nas dge slong dag dge don gyi thad du song song nas/ bar 'ga' ni mdzod srung mi snyed de mdzod sgo mi phyed/ gal te mdzod srung 'ongs na yang yid bzhin du mi ster bas/ dge don gyis 'di snyam sems
so/ /'di ltar gyur pa 'di ni mdzod bsrungs kyis ni thugs mi thub kyis/ yab kyi man ngag 'ongs kyis yongs yang bus ni pha'i bang mdzod stong par byas pa'i mi rigs kyis/ bdag gis thabs ci zhig byas na
rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed de/ skye bo mang po la phan 'dogs par 'gyur snyam bsams nas/ mi dag la 'di skad ces dris so/ /'jig rten las ci byas na nor dbyig mang du rnyed cing zad mi shes par 'gyur

zhes dris pa dang / kha cig ni zhing cher rmo na nor dbyig mang du 'gyur zhes zer ro/ /kha cig ni rkang 'gros spel te/ spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed zer ro/ /kha cig ni rgya mtshor zhugs de/ nor bu rin po che blangs na rin po che

mang du 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis de dag smras pa thos nas zhing rmo ba dang / rkang 'gros spel ba dang / lam ring por tshong pa la 'gro ba ni nga'i cha ma yin no/ /rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'ba' shig nga'i cha yin no zhes smras

nas rgya mtshor 'jug go/ /zhes bsams te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni rgya mtsho nas rin po che mang po blangs te/ dbul 'phongs pa la sbyin pa yid bzhin du bya'o/ /bdag rgya mtshor rin po che len du 'gro

bar gnong shig ces smras so/ /de'i pha mas de skad ces smras pa thos nas 'khams te bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jig rten na dbul 'phongs pa dag blo med de/ lus dang srog dang / bsdos nas 'gro bar byed do/ /

khyod cis 'phongs na/ de lta bu'i sems/ khyod sbyin par 'dod na/ khyim na yod pa'i nor thams cad sbyin par byas shig /rgya mtshor ni 'gro mi rung ste/ rgya mtsho'i nang na chu rlabs dang / rba'i klong 'khyil ba dang / chu srin

dang / klu gdug pa dang / srin mo dang / ri chu'i mdog can la sogs te shin tu ya nga ba'i bgegs mang du yod pas thar dka' na/ khyod cis 'phongs shing srog dang bsdos par byed/ 'di la ni nyan pa med kyi ma sems

par 'dug cig ces bsgo'o/ /dge don gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/ bsams pa bzhin du ma grub pas yi dam bcas te/ bsam pa 'di ma grub kyi bar du pha ma'i mdun du sa la kha sbub tu nyal te/ mi ldang ngo / /

snyam bsams nas/ yab dang yum gyis mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag ni bsams pa bzhin du ma grub kyi bar du kha sbub du nyal ba 'di las mi ldang ngo / zhes smras so/ /de nas pha ma mi dga' ste/ gnyen bshes dang

'grogs te/ rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs kyang mang du yod pa'i gtam byas so/ /bdag kyang rmongs pas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar tu lha kun mchod de/ khyod lta zhig nga'i bur skyes na/ nged ma bor bar zan zo shig ces zhag cig

gnyis nas zhag drug gi bar du tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gros btab kyang ma nyan te/ sngar ci smras pa las ma zlog go pha ma yang dngangs nas 'di skad ces bsgros so/ /bdag gi bu thog ma btsas nas da lta tsam gyi bar

du bya ba btsams pa tha mar ma grub kyi bar du mi gtong bas/ rgya mtshor btang na gal te phyir log kyang srid kyis/ ma btang na zhag bdun lon nas 'phral bye bral byed ste/ da ni btang dgos so snyam bgros nas/ bu'i gan du

song ste/ lag pa nas bzung nas/ bu longs la zan zo shig /yid bzhin du 'gro bar gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang / dge don langs ste/ zan zos btung ba 'thungs so/ /de nas phyi rol du byung ste/ mi mang po la

kho bo ni rgya mtshor rin po che len du 'gro'o/ /khyod su 'gro ba dag kyang 'grogs te/ 'dong gis ded dpon yang kho bos byas la yo byad kyang kho bos sbyar ro zhes bsgrags so/ /de'i tshe na yul de na tshong pa lnga brgya snyed kyis

bdag cag kyang rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchi'o zhes thams cad 'dus nas chas so/ /de'i tshe na yul de na ded dpon rgan po zhig sngon cad kyang rgya mtshor lan du ma zhig phyin pa yod de/ rgyal bu nyid de'i gan du song nas

'di skad ces smras so/ /kho bo rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sa mkhan du 'gro dgos kyis/ khyod kyang chos shig ces bsgo ba dang / ded dpon gyis bdag ni rgas 'khogs pa'i steng du mig gis kyang mi mthong bas/ 'gro mi nus so/ /
zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal bu pha'i thad du song nas/ /rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ded dpon rgan po zhig mchis pa sngon cad rgya mtshor lan du ma zhig phyin te/ rgya mtsho'i rgyus mchis kyi/

bdag rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sa mkhan du bka' stsal cig ces gsol pa dang / rgyal po de nyid ded dpon long ba'i gan su song nas/ ded dpon de la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /rgyal bu rgya mtshor 'gro 'dod de/ nged kyi

'gror mi rung ba'i gros de lta zhig btab na ma nyan kyis/ rgyal bu rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sa mkhan du khyod songs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag rgas 'khogs pa'i

steng du mig gnyis kyang mdongs mod kyis/ nga rgyal pos bka' stsal na/ bka' mi bcag go zhes gsol to/ /rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas/ nga'i bu dang rgya mtshor 'gro phod pa su yod ces dris pa dang / rgyal bu sdig

don yang bdag pho bo'i g.yog tu 'gro'o zhes gsol to/ /rgyal pos bsams pa/ /gzhan song ba bas nu bo song na phan snyam nas/ nu bo yang 'gro bar gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal bus gser srang sum stong shig phyung nas/

srang stong ni gru zong du byas/ srang nyi stong ni 'phral du dgos pa'i yo byad du sbyar te chas nas/ rgyal po dang btsun mo la sogs pa thams cad kyis bskyal lo/ /de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin nas grur zhugs nas

thag pa bdun gyis brtod nas/ rlung phyogs dang sbyar te 'gro ba'i tshong pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/ snga phyir 'dong ba ni rab du mang na/ phyir 'gro ba ni nyung

rab bo/ /de las the tsom za ba zhig yod na phyir deng shig /gal te lus dang / srog la mi blta nas/ pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / gnyen bshes dag la yang ma chags te/ rin po che'i gling du phyin te/

phyir yang bde bar 'khor na bu tsha rabs bdun tshun cad nor gyis mi brel bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo nas thag pa cig bcad do/ /de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du nyin re lan re de skad bsgo nas/ thag pa re re bcad

de rlung phyogs su bab pa la g.yor zhing bsgrengs te/ mgyogs khyad mda' bzhin song ngo / /de nas rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/ rgyal bu rin po che brtags pa la shin tu mkhas pas/ rin po che bzang ngan dang /

mang nyung tshad kyang bstan nas rin po che tshol lo/ /ded dpon gnyis gru chung ngu zhig gi nang du zhugs nas/ tshongs pa phal rnams der bor ro/ /de nas song song ba las ded dpon gyis da ni ri dkar po zhig snang ba'i

rigs na ma mthong ngam zhes dris na/ rgyal bus kyang de 'dra ba zhig snang ngo zhes smras pa dang / de ni dngul gyi ri yin no zhes zer ro/ /de nas yang song song ba las da ni ri sngon po zhig snang ba'i rigs na mthong ngam zhes

dris na/ de 'dra ba cig snang ngo zhes smras pa dang / de ni bai dur+ya'i ri yin no zhes smras so/ /de nas yang song song ba las da ni ri ser po zhig snang ba'i rigs so zhes dris na/ ri ser po 'dra ba zhig snang ngo zhes smras pa

dang / de ni gser gyi ri yin no zhes smras so/ /de nas gser gyi ri'i drung du phyin te/ gser gyi bye ma'i steng du 'dug go/ /ded dpon des 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni rgas zhom ste da ni 'gro mi phod do/ /'di nyid

du tshe'i dus byas par 'gyur gyis/ khyod 'di nas song shig dang mdun na rin po che sna bdun gyi mkhar zhig dang phrad pa'i rigs kyis/ gal te mkhar sgo bcad cing 'dug na sgo drung du rdo rje'i gtun zhig yod pa'i rigs

rdo rje'i gtun gyis mkhar gyi sgo brdungs shig dang / nang nas lha mo lnga brgya zhig so so nas/ rin po che thogs te 'bul du 'ong ngo / /de nas lha mo gcig kyang rin po che sngon po cig thogs shing 'dun du 'ong gi/ de ni

yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin no/ /thob ma thag tu ma shor bar dam du zung shig /bu mo gzhan dag gi rin po che yang long shig /dbang po rab tu bsdoms la de dag la ma smra shig /bdag ni nyam thag

ste 'dir tshe 'phos na drin dran par gyis la/ 'di nyid du rus bu sbas te/ song shig ces bsgo ma thag tu tshe'i dus byas so/ /de nas ded dpon gyi bus rus bu gser gyi bye ma'i nang du sbas nas/ bsgo ba bzhin song nas

rin po che sna bdun gyi mkhar gyi drung du phyin to/ /sgo yang dam du bcad pa las drung du rdo rje'i gtun blangs te/ brdungs pa dang sgo yang rang bye ba dang / lha mo lnga brgya so so nas 'ong 'ong nas rin po che thogs de 'bul bar

byed do/ /nang gi lha mo snga ma cig gis lag pa na nor bu rin po che sngon po zhig thogs te/ smras pa bzhin blangs nas gos kyi tha mar phur te/ de ma thag tu phyir log go/ /rgyal bu dang bral ba'i 'og tu rgyal bu sdig don gyis tshong

pa rnams la rin po che mang du long shig ces byas pas tshong pa rnams kyis mang du blangs pas gru yang bar 'ga' ni nub/ bar 'ga' ni byung nas/ rgyal bu dge don 'ba' shig ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yod

pas chur ma nub bo/ /rgyal bu sdig don skrag nas dge don la yang skyobs shig ces smras pa dang / sdig don khrid de rgya mtsho brgal to/ /de nas skam sar phyin pa dang / sdig don gyis pho bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

bdag cag spun gnyis pha ma dang bral te/ rgya mtshor rin po che len du song ba las ma steg ste/ rin po che dang bral nas lag pa stong par khyim du 'gro ba ni ngo tsha'o/ /rgyal bu dge don rang bzhin gyis drang bas/ nu bo la

bdag gis rin po che thob na ci'i phyir ngo tsha zhes smras so/ /rin po che ci lta bu zhig rnyed pa bdag la bstan du gsol zhes smras pa dang / pho bos rin po che bkrol te nu bo la bstan te/ /nu bos rin pho che mthong nas 'di

snyam du bsams so/ /bdag gi pha ma yang bur 'dra ba las pho bo la byams te/ bdag la mi byams pa'i steng du bdag gnyis 'grogs te/ rin po che len du song ba las/ pho bos rin po che rnyed kyis/ bdag ni ci
